original: @53b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @53b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i badzra aa mri ta ma h'a ta natra r'a dzny'a sht'i k'a n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i badzra aa mri ta ma h'a ta natra r'a dzny'a sht'i k'a n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-vajra-amṛta-mahā-tantra-rāja-śatikā-nāma.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The commentary on the great king of tantras, the glorious Vajra Amṛta, called the Extensive Explanation.

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the ḍākinīs.

original: tshangs pa gzi brjid thig le mchog /'dod chags tshogs rnams rnam dag pa //
analyzed: tshangs pa gzi brjid thig le mchog /'dod chags tshogs rnams rnam dag pa //
translated: Brahmā, the supreme essence of splendor, purified the assembly of desires,

original: bla ma zla ba lta bu dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i zhabs btud nas //
analyzed: bla ma zla ba lta bu dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i zhabs btud nas //
translated: Having bowed to the guru, the moon-like one, and the feet of Vajra Amṛta,

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgya cher 'grel bshad bya //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgya cher 'grel bshad bya //
translated: I will explain the commentary on Vajra Amṛta.

original: rgyud 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
translated: The subject matter of this tantra is Bhagavān Vajra Amṛta, the embodiment of the mandala of killing.

original: de rjod par byed pa nyid kyis rgyud 'di yang de'i mngon par brjod par bzhed do //
analyzed: de rjod par byed pa nyid kyis rgyud 'di yang de'i mngon par brjod par bzhed do //
translated: Since it expresses that, this tantra is also considered to be its expression.

original: brjod bya dang rjod byed ni smra bya dang smra byed nyid du 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: brjod bya dang rjod byed ni smra bya dang smra byed nyid du 'brel ba'o //
translated: The subject matter and the expression are connected as the spoken and the speaker.

original: 'dis gdul bya'i skye bo gzhug cing rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis gdul bya'i skye bo gzhug cing rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
translated: The purpose is to introduce and realize the beings to be tamed.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: The ultimate purpose is to attain the result, such as the nectar of nirvana.

original: 'dir rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams rtogs par bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams rtogs par bya ba ni /
translated: Here, the expression, the expressed, the connection, and the ultimate purpose are to be understood.

original: le'u bcu gcig gi rgyud 'dir nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig gi rgyud 'dir nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: In this tantra of eleven chapters, they are definitely taught.

original: dang por gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i gsang ba'i le'u nges par bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das ma sdud par byed pa'i ni m'a ma k'i'i gnas la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba nas brtsams te gsungs pa /
analyzed: dang por gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i gsang ba'i le'u nges par bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das ma sdud par byed pa'i ni m'a ma k'i'i gnas la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba nas brtsams te gsungs pa /
translated: First, the secret chapter on creating the secret mandala is definitely taught. The nature of the Bhagavatī is to gather. The abode of Māmakī and so on are described as perfect. Beginning from there, it is said:

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus have I heard.

original: 'di skad ces pa ni rgyud yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i don rnams 'dir bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces pa ni rgyud yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i don rnams 'dir bsdus pa'o //
translated: Thus means that the meaning of the complete tantra is summarized here.

original: bdag gis zhes pa ni gzhan du brgyud pa las 'ongs pa ma yin gyi //
analyzed: bdag gis zhes pa ni gzhan du brgyud pa las 'ongs pa ma yin gyi //
translated: “By me” means not from a lineage from another.

original: m'a ma k'i'i bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du yin no //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i'i bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du yin no //
translated: It is directly from the nature of Māmakī.

original: thos pa zhes pa ni chos kyi rnam @54a * //
analyzed: thos pa zhes pa ni chos kyi rnam @54a * //
translated: “Heard” means the enumeration of dharmas

original: grangs bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba de /
analyzed: grangs bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba de /
translated: experienced by the nature of the self.

original: 'di skad kyi sgras bsdus par rtogs so //
analyzed: 'di skad kyi sgras bsdus par rtogs so //
translated: It is understood to be included in the word “thus.”

original: rnam thos zhes pa la gsungs shig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam thos zhes pa la gsungs shig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Speak” in “speak to Vaiśravaṇa” and so on.

original: gcig gi sgras ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i dus bkar ba'o //
analyzed: gcig gi sgras ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i dus bkar ba'o //
translated: The word “one” refers to the time of equipoise.

original: de gsungs par gyur pa /🔽gang zhig nyon mongs mtha' bral ba'i //
analyzed: de gsungs par gyur pa / gang zhig nyon mongs mtha' bral ba'i //
translated: That is said to be🔽the Bhagavān, who is free from the extremes of affliction,

original: bcom ldan yid bzhin nor lta bu //
analyzed: bcom ldan yid bzhin nor lta bu //
translated: like a wish-fulfilling gem,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med pa //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med pa //
translated: inconceivable, nondual,

original: ting 'dzin skye ba'i chos ston pa //
analyzed: ting 'dzin skye ba'i chos ston pa //
translated: teaching the Dharma of the arising of samādhi,

original: bdud rtsi'i char ni 'gro la 'bab //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i char ni 'gro la 'bab //
translated: a rain of nectar falling on beings,

original: de ru rgyun mi chad pa ru //
analyzed: de ru rgyun mi chad pa ru //
translated: there, without interruption,

original: chos rnams ston pa mnyam gzhag dus //
analyzed: chos rnams ston pa mnyam gzhag dus //
translated: teaching the Dharma in the time of equipoise.

original: zhes pa'o // gang las thos zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // gang las thos zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: “From whom is it heard?” is said.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
translated: The Blessed One abides here is connected.

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid ni ston pa po yin pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das las dngos su zhes pa la sogs pa shugs kyis go ba'o //🔽bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid ni ston pa po yin pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das las dngos su zhes pa la sogs pa shugs kyis go ba'o // bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das sam /
translated: The Blessed One himself is the teacher, and the Blessed One is the direct source of the words of the tantra, and so forth, which are understood by implication.

original: sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa bla na med pa'i shes rab ni bha ga zhes pa ste bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa bla na med pa'i shes rab ni bha ga zhes pa ste bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Blessed One is the lord of the yoga of immortality, and the Blessed One is the bhaga, the supreme wisdom that is the antidote to all obscurations.

original: gang du bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //🔽de thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na /
analyzed: gang du bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o // de thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na /
translated: In what place did the Blessed One teach this?🔽The Blessed One taught this in the bhaga of all the tathagatas, and so forth.🔽All of them are tathagatas, and so

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste /🔽ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'i bdud rtsi'i thabs kyis bdud rtsir gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste /🔽ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'i bdud rtsi'i thabs kyis bdud rtsir gshegs pa ni /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: the Tathagatas.

original: sku rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: sku rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Vairocana is the Vajra of Body.

original: gsungs rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: gsungs rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: Amitabha is the Vajra of Speech.

original: thugs rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Akshobhya is the Vajra of Mind.

original: de rnams kyi snying po ni mchog tu dga' ba las skyes pa gzhig tu med pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni mchog tu dga' ba las skyes pa gzhig tu med pa'o //
translated: Their essence is the indestructible arising from supreme joy.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu nye bar btags pas na 'di nyid ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu nye bar btags pas na 'di nyid ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
translated: Since the result is figuratively designated as the cause, this is the Vajra Nectar.

original: de la gsang ba'i padma gang zhig la gnas pa ni gsang ba'i padmar dgongs so //
analyzed: de la gsang ba'i padma gang zhig la gnas pa ni gsang ba'i padmar dgongs so //
translated: The one who abides in the secret lotus is intended by the words in the secret lotus.

original: gsang ba'i padma zhes pa ni spyan ma dang sgrol ma dang gos dkar mo rnams kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma zhes pa ni spyan ma dang sgrol ma dang gos dkar mo rnams kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
translated: The secret lotus is the source of phenomena of Locana, Mamaki, and Pandara.

original: lha mo gsum gyi gdan ni rnam 'bor gyi gnas su gyur pa de rnams su //
analyzed: lha mo gsum gyi gdan ni rnam 'bor gyi gnas su gyur pa de rnams su //
translated: The seats of the three goddesses are the places of the secret lotus.

original: gdul ba'i skye bo rnams rjes su gzung ba'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so //
analyzed: gdul ba'i skye bo rnams rjes su gzung ba'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so //
translated: For the sake of guiding beings, he abides there by his magical power.

original: yang na rigs gsum dbyer med pa gnyis su med @54b par rdzogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bdud rtsi de'i gzhi chos kyi 'byung gnas //
analyzed: yang na rigs gsum dbyer med pa gnyis su med @54b par rdzogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bdud rtsi de'i gzhi chos kyi 'byung gnas //
translated: Or else, the nondual perfection of the indivisibility of the three families is the Blessed One Vajra Amṛta.

original: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gru gsum rnal 'byor gyi gnas kyi steng du /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gru gsum rnal 'byor gyi gnas kyi steng du /
translated: In the middle of the celestial palace, on the triangular abode of yoga,

original: gsang ba'i padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i lte bar bzhugs so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i lte bar bzhugs so //
translated: he resides in the center of the secret lotus with a thousand petals.

original: bzhugs zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa rdo rje bdud rtsis bstan pas m'a ma k'i'i yid 'phrog ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa rdo rje bdud rtsis bstan pas m'a ma k'i'i yid 'phrog ces pa'i don to //
translated: The word resides is explained by the various Vajra Amṛtas. The meaning of enchanting Māmakī is this.

original: ci bcom ldan 'das gcig po der bzhugs sam zhes pa la /
analyzed: ci bcom ldan 'das gcig po der bzhugs sam zhes pa la /
translated: Is the Blessed One alone there?

original: gsungs pa / rol rtsed bcom ldan rdo rje can //🔽zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rol rtsed bcom ldan rdo rje can // zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said: The Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, plays.

original: rol rtsed ces pa ni lha mo dang bcas par rol pas bla na med pa'i rol rtsed la longs spyod pa ste ;
analyzed: rol rtsed ces pa ni lha mo dang bcas par rol pas bla na med pa'i rol rtsed la longs spyod pa ste ;
translated: And so on. Play means that he enjoys the unsurpassed play by playing with the goddesses.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i m'a ma k'i thag nye ba na gnas pa la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i dgongs pas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i de kho na nyid la rnam par gnas nas 'di nyid grub ces nye bar 'dus te ston par bzhed pas /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i m'a ma k'i thag nye ba na gnas pa la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i dgongs pas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i de kho na nyid la rnam par gnas nas 'di nyid grub ces nye bar 'dus te ston par bzhed pas /
translated: Having seen that Vajra Amṛta was staying nearby, he, the Bhagavān, with the intention of the third verse, having remained in the reality of Vajra Amṛta, wished to teach the assembly that this [Vajra Amṛta] was accomplished.

original: rol rtsed la longs spyod pa ni m'a ma k'i dang bcas par longs spyod ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: rol rtsed la longs spyod pa ni m'a ma k'i dang bcas par longs spyod ces pa'i don to //
translated: Enjoying the play means enjoying together with Māmakī.

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Bhagavān, endowed with the qualities of Īśvara and so forth,

original: rtse lnga pa ni ye shes ki rdo rje zhes pa 'di snyi rdo rje can ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: rtse lnga pa ni ye shes ki rdo rje zhes pa 'di snyi rdo rje can ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
translated: the five-peaked one, the one with the wisdom vajra, is the vajra holder, Vajra Amṛta.

original: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i lhar rab tu gnas pa ste /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i lhar rab tu gnas pa ste /
translated: Māmakī is fully present as the deity of the lord of the vajra family.

original: rang gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar 'khor ba'i pho nya mo de rnams dang bcas par man ngag brgyad po 'dis bden par bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar 'khor ba'i pho nya mo de rnams dang bcas par man ngag brgyad po 'dis bden par bsgoms pa'o //
translated: Together with those messengers who circle at the base of his feet, he meditates on the truth with these eight instructions.

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor ma gsungs zhes pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor ma gsungs zhes pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to dispel the doubt, “Why is the retinue of Bodhisattvas, etc. not mentioned? ”

original: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par sbyor bar bsgoms pas ji lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par sbyor bar bsgoms pas ji lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is just as it is meditated upon, by being in union with the consort such as Māmakī.

original: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag nyams su myong ba bsgrub par 'dod pas dngos su byed de //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag nyams su myong ba bsgrub par 'dod pas dngos su byed de //
translated: One who wishes to accomplish the experience of the esoteric instructions of reality does it in actuality.

original: rdo rje 'khor gyi tshul du m'a ma k'i yang nye bar bstan gyi //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor gyi tshul du m'a ma k'i yang nye bar bstan gyi //
translated: Māmakī is taught as being in the retinue of Vajra,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ma yin zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ma yin zhes brjod pa'o //
translated: but not as being in the retinue of Bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin du yang gsang ba'i mdzod las gsungs pa /🔽phyag na rdo rje gsang bdag la //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsang ba'i mdzod las gsungs pa / phyag na rdo rje gsang bdag la //
translated: Similarly, the Secret Treasury says:🔽To Vajrapāṇi, the Lord of Secrets,

original: rdo rje dri ma rnyed nas ni ;
analyzed: rdo rje dri ma rnyed nas ni ;
translated: having found the vajra stain,🔽do it for the sake of sentient beings.

original: / sems can gyi ni don gyis shig / phyag na rdo rjes kyang de blta //
analyzed: / sems can gyi ni don gyis shig / phyag na rdo rjes kyang de blta //
translated: Vajrapāṇi also sees it.

original: ngo mtshar khro mo zhes pa 'dis //
analyzed: ngo mtshar khro mo zhes pa 'dis //
translated: With this “Amazing Wrathful One”

original: sems can gyi ni don bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi ni don bya'o //
translated: one should do it for the sake of sentient beings.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: grong mchog ces pa ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //🔽de ltar gnas la sogs pa'i gleng @55a * //
analyzed: grong mchog ces pa ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo // de ltar gnas la sogs pa'i gleng @55a * //
translated: The “supreme village” is the celestial mansion just mentioned.

original: gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
analyzed: gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the perfect setting, such as the place, and so on,

original: da ni bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i rgyud nyan par 'dod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston par brtson te /
analyzed: da ni bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i rgyud nyan par 'dod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston par brtson te /
translated: now, the Bhagavān is intent on teaching the Dharma to those who desire to listen to the Tantra of the Desire for Nectar.

original: 'dir gsol ba 'debs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir gsol ba 'debs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the supplication is stated:

original: de tu lha mo des zhus pa //🔽zhes pa la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: de tu lha mo des zhus pa // zhes pa la sogs pa'o /
translated: Thus, the goddess asked.

original: zhus pa zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i man ngag go //
analyzed: zhus pa zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i man ngag go //
translated: Here, “asked” is the intimate instruction that will be explained.

original: der zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang du'o //
analyzed: der zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang du'o //
translated: “There” is in the celestial mansion.

original: des zhes pa ni m'a ma k'is so //
analyzed: des zhes pa ni m'a ma k'is so //
translated: “By her” is by Māmakī.

original: dam pa'i chos kyi rol rtsed la dga' bas lha mo'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi rol rtsed la dga' bas lha mo'o //
translated: The goddess is one who delights in the play of the sublime Dharma.

original: gsang ba zhes pa ni gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams med par gnas pas so //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa ni gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams med par gnas pas so //
translated: “Secretly” means that it is a place where other gods, such as bodhisattvas, are absent.

original: tu'i sgra ni bden pa'i don to //
analyzed: tu'i sgra ni bden pa'i don to //
translated: The word tu means “true.”

original: bag chags kyi nyes pa mtha' dag bsal ba dang / bla na med pa'i bdud rtse thob par bya ba'i phyir de rtogs pa'i thabs ston par bshad pa'i rdo rje can rtogs pa dris zhes par dgos so //
analyzed: bag chags kyi nyes pa mtha' dag bsal ba dang / bla na med pa'i bdud rtse thob par bya ba'i phyir de rtogs pa'i thabs ston par bshad pa'i rdo rje can rtogs pa dris zhes par dgos so //
translated: In order to remove all the faults of habitual tendencies and to attain unsurpassed nectar, the one who explains the teaching of the means of realizing that is addressed as O Vajra Holder, ask about realization.

original: ci zhig dris zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci zhig dris zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: What is asked? It is said:

original: lha khyod nyid kyis sngon du gsungs zhes pa'o//
analyzed: lha khyod nyid kyis sngon du gsungs zhes pa'o//
translated: O god, you yourself have previously spoken.

original: gsungs zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsdus pa'o //🔽lha'i dngos ni lha'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsdus pa'o // lha'i dngos ni lha'o //
translated: The word spoken includes non-abiding nirvana.

original: gzhan yang 'di ltar rje bo'i bye brag la bud med rnams lha'i sgras chags pa dang bcas pa'i gtam byed ces pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di ltar rje bo'i bye brag la bud med rnams lha'i sgras chags pa dang bcas pa'i gtam byed ces pa'o //
translated: The word god is used for women, as it is a term of endearment.

original: khyod ces pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsis so //
analyzed: khyod ces pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsis so //
translated: It is said: You refers to Vajra Nectar.

original: sngon du zhes pa ni thog mar te /
analyzed: sngon du zhes pa ni thog mar te /
translated: Previously means at the beginning.

original: 'dir m'a ma k'i thag nye ba la gzigs nas zhes pa'i don te //
analyzed: 'dir m'a ma k'i thag nye ba la gzigs nas zhes pa'i don te //
translated: Here, it means seeing in the vicinity of Mamaki.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsis thog ma'i 'khor rnams la m'a ma k'i thag nye ba la gzigs pa ni rgyud kyi don nye bar bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i dgongs pas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsis thog ma'i 'khor rnams la m'a ma k'i thag nye ba la gzigs pa ni rgyud kyi don nye bar bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i dgongs pas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The Vajra Amṛta [Tantra] is to be understood by the intention of the third verse that summarizes the meaning of the tantra, which is to be seen by the close disciples of Māmakī.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
translated: And also it is said:

original: sdug pa'i padma bltas nas ni ;
analyzed: sdug pa'i padma bltas nas ni ;
translated: Having seen the lotus of the beloved,

original: ; nga yis de nyid rab gsal bya //
analyzed: ; nga yis de nyid rab gsal bya //
translated: I will illuminate that reality.

original: zhes pa'o // yang na rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa sngon gsungs pa de las yang 'dir bsdus te brjod par bya zhes pa ste zhes pa ste //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // yang na rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa sngon gsungs pa de las yang 'dir bsdus te brjod par bya zhes pa ste zhes pa ste //
translated: Or, it is said that the Vajra Amṛta Tantra, which was previously taught in twelve thousand chapters, is here summarized and will be taught.

original: de'i dus la ltos nas sngon gyi sgra bltas bar bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: de'i dus la ltos nas sngon gyi sgra bltas bar bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: The word previously should be seen in relation to that time.

original: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa //
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa //
translated: What was taught? It is said:

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog //
translated: The supreme Vajra Amṛta Tantra,

original: ces pa las sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa las sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang sgom pa la sogs pa bsdus pas sam skyob pas na rgyud do //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang sgom pa la sogs pa bsdus pas sam skyob pas na rgyud do //
translated: It is a tantra because it protects or summarizes the essence of the Vajra Amṛta maṇḍala, meditation, and so on.

original: ming ci zhig snyam pa la gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ming ci zhig snyam pa la gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: As for the name, it is said vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi ming can no //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi ming can no //
translated: It is named Vajra Amṛta.

original: rgyud thams cad las phul @55b du byung bas na mchog go //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad las phul @55b du byung bas na mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is the best of all tantras.

original: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Amṛta is nirvāṇa.

original: de'i sgrub thabs ni dngos su byed pa'i don te //
analyzed: de'i sgrub thabs ni dngos su byed pa'i don te //
translated: Its means of accomplishment is the direct object.

original: thabs kyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyu'o //
translated: It is the cause of the means.

original: de ni rang gis gsungs zhes pa ni rab tu gsal bar mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rang gis gsungs zhes pa ni rab tu gsal bar mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: That is said by oneself means make it very clear.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas /
translated: Having thus requested the Bhagavān,

original: sngon du nye bar bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi don nye bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngon du nye bar bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi don nye bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa gsungs pa /
translated: in order to understand the meaning of the previously summarized tantra, he said,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje bka' stsal zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje bka' stsal zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavān said, 'vajra,' etc.

original: zhes pa'i sgra ni gso la ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sgra ni gso la ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: The word 'thus' means immediately after the request.

original: bka' stsal zhes pa ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bka' stsal zhes pa ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: 'Said' means 'spoken.'

original: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: What was said? It is said:

original: bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ste gsungs zhes pa 'dir 'brel te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ste gsungs zhes pa 'dir 'brel te /
translated: The phrase inconceivable and so on is connected to the phrase is taught.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa ni bsam du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu byed pa'i phyir bsam pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa ni bsam du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu byed pa'i phyir bsam pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The word inconceivable means free from conceptualization, because it serves as the cause of the inconceivable dharmadhatu.

original: zad pa ni brlag pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa ni brlag pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word exhausted means destroyed and so on.

original: zad pa med pa ni brlag pa med pa ste /
analyzed: zad pa med pa ni brlag pa med pa ste /
translated: The word inexhaustible means undestroyed,

original: ma skyes pa dang mi 'gag pa dang / chos nyid dang rgyu med pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang mi 'gag pa dang / chos nyid dang rgyu med pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: which means unborn, unceased, reality, and causeless.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las ldog par byed pa nyid kyis phra ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las ldog par byed pa nyid kyis phra ba'o //
translated: It is subtle because it turns away from objects such as form.

original: de la la na re phra ba'i sgras ni bdag la sogs par brjod do //
analyzed: de la la na re phra ba'i sgras ni bdag la sogs par brjod do //
translated: Some say that the word subtle refers to the self and so on.

original: de rnams kun du bsdus pa nyid kyis phra bar brjod do //🔽don med pa ni 'bras bu med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kun du bsdus pa nyid kyis phra bar brjod do // don med pa ni 'bras bu med pa ste /
translated: They are called subtle because they are completely included in that.🔽 The word meaningless means without result.

original: don med pa ma yin pa'i don can te 'bras bu dang bcas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: don med pa ma yin pa'i don can te 'bras bu dang bcas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The word not meaningless means having a result.

original: dbang po las 'das zhes pa ni sku dang gsungs mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams kyi yul ma yin zhing //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das zhes pa ni sku dang gsungs mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams kyi yul ma yin zhing //
translated: Transcendent to the senses means that the body, speech, eyes, etc., are not objects of the senses.

original: chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis dbang po las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis dbang po las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is transcendent to the senses because it is the cause of the reality of the Dharma.

original: dbang po'i sgras ni byed par brjod do //
analyzed: dbang po'i sgras ni byed par brjod do //
translated: The word senses refers to the faculties.

original: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i byed pa dang bral bas de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pas dbang po las 'das zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i byed pa dang bral bas de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pas dbang po las 'das zhes pa'o //
translated: It is transcendent to the senses because it is the reality that is free from the faculties of the eyes, etc.

original: gzhan yang mchog ni yang dag par khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang mchog ni yang dag par khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
translated: Moreover, supreme means perfectly exalted.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa chos rnams nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa chos rnams nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir /
translated: It is peace because it pacifies the phenomena of desire, etc.

original: rgyu nyid kyis zhi ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyis zhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace by cause.

original: sgrub pa thams cad sbang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa thams cad sbang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure because it purifies all practices.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la dbyer mi byed pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la dbyer mi byed pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Vajra-amṛta means the wisdom that is not to be divided.

original: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste de bzhin du de'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyang de ltar gyur pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste de bzhin du de'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyang de ltar gyur pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nectar is nirvana, and in the same way, the Vajra Nectar Tantra is of that nature, by virtue of being its cause.

original: gsungs pa @56a * //
analyzed: gsungs pa @56a * //
translated: The statement

original: ni mngon du bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: ni mngon du bsdus pa yin no //
translated: is a summary of the manifest.

original: 'dis ni rang gi nye bar rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ston zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni rang gi nye bar rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ston zhes pa ste /
translated: This is saying, “The Bhagavān teaches to me, his disciple.”

original: de ltar sngon du bsdus pa'i rgyud m'a ma k'is rjes su dran nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngon du bsdus pa'i rgyud m'a ma k'is rjes su dran nas /
translated: Thus, having remembered the previous summary of the tantra,

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de kho na nyid gang zhig mngon sum du mdzad pa gang zhig rgyud gzhan rnams su spas pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gzhan ma yin par gsungs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de kho na nyid gang zhig mngon sum du mdzad pa gang zhig rgyud gzhan rnams su spas pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gzhan ma yin par gsungs zhes pa'o //
translated: now, the Bhagavān, by means of the vajra nectar samādhi, that which is the suchness that he actualized, which was concealed in other tantras, the Bhagavān teaches to me, his disciple, not to others.”

original: nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, it says:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
translated: Then the Bhagavān, the vajra holder,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can bka' stsal zhes //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can bka' stsal zhes //
translated: The Bhagavān, the vajra holder, spoke.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bde ba che //
translated: the great bliss of vajra nectar.

original: zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
translated: This is the connection.

original: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa'i tshig gi don to //
translated: Then means immediately after the request, the meaning of the words of the Blessed One.

original: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o // rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes pa ni /
translated: What was said? It is vajra nectar samādhi, and so on.

original: rtsi'i 'o ma'i rang bzhin gzhig tu med pa'i rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms pa'i khyad par ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rtsi'i 'o ma'i rang bzhin gzhig tu med pa'i rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms pa'i khyad par ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Vajra nectar samādhi means the yoga of the indestructible complete maṇḍala, the nature of the milk of nectar. The meditation on the union of vajra nectar is the vajra nectar samādhi.

original: de nyid bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to specify that, it is said:

original: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni m'a ma k'i dang bcas par yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgoms pa 'di ni chags pa'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni m'a ma k'i dang bcas par yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgoms pa 'di ni chags pa'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: With Māmakī means this meditation on the union with Māmakī is the union of passion, the samādhi of great passion.

original: ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhes pa'o //
translated: It is the samādhi of great passion.

original: m'a ma k'i la chags pa dang ldan pa des rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyi byed pa por gyur pa'am rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i la chags pa dang ldan pa des rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin gyi byed pa por gyur pa'am rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: By that passion of Māmakī, he is the agent of the vajra-amṛta samādhi, or he is the cause.

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa ni nga yis mngon sum du byas pa'am mngon sum du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa ni nga yis mngon sum du byas pa'am mngon sum du gyur pa ste /
translated: The illumination of the secret reality is that which I have made manifest or that which has become manifest.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'dir yis spyad //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'dir yis spyad //
translated: In this samādhi, he has practiced.

original: ces bsdus par gyur to //
analyzed: ces bsdus par gyur to //
translated: This is the summary.

original: de bzhin du yang gsang ba'i mdzod las phyag na rdo rje la gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsang ba'i mdzod las phyag na rdo rje la gsungs pa /
translated: Similarly, in the Secret Treasury, it is said to Vajrapāṇi:

original: gsang ba zhes bya kun du spyad par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya kun du spyad par bya //
translated: The so-called secret should be practiced.

original: zhes pa'o // 'dir ci zhig gsungs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gzhan du yang gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'dir ci zhig gsungs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gzhan du yang gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Here, what is said? Is this vajra-amṛta samādhi not taught elsewhere?

original: gang gis de rab tu gsal bar mdzad ces pa la /
analyzed: gang gis de rab tu gsal bar mdzad ces pa la /
translated: By what is it illuminated?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / sbas pa zhes pa ste ma gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / sbas pa zhes pa ste ma gsungs pa'o //
translated: The so-called hidden, that is, not taught.

original: gang gi phyir 'di bstan pa ni bud med rnams nyid yin gyi gzhan rnams su gzhung 'di spos zhes par dgongs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di bstan pa ni bud med rnams nyid yin gyi gzhan rnams su gzhung 'di spos zhes par dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that this teaching is for women themselves, and this scripture should not be spread to others.

original: yang @56b gsang ba'i mdzod las phyag na rdo rje la gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang @56b gsang ba'i mdzod las phyag na rdo rje la gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, in the Secret Treasury, it is said to Vajrapāṇi:

original: bud med slob mar byas nas ni //
analyzed: bud med slob mar byas nas ni //
translated: Having made a woman a disciple,

original: thams cad de nyid bstan par bya //
analyzed: thams cad de nyid bstan par bya //
translated: teach her the truth.

original: zhes pa'o // gang du spas zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // gang du spas zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: In the statement “where it should not be spread,” it is said:

original: rgyud rnams kun du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In all the tantras, etc.

original: rgyud rnams kun du zhes pa ni dam pa dang po dang gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang rgyud phyi ma rnams su'o //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du zhes pa ni dam pa dang po dang gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang rgyud phyi ma rnams su'o //
translated: “In all the tantras” refers to the root and explanatory tantras such as the [Hevajra] Tantra in Two Sections and the Guhyasamaja.

original: ci zhig spas zhes pa la ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig spas zhes pa la ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What should not be spread? It is said: “wisdom,” etc.

original: ye shes zhes pa ni de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par shar ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes pa ni de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par shar ba'o //
translated: “Wisdom” is the unerring arising of reality.

original: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na bdud rtsi'i ming can no //
analyzed: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na bdud rtsi'i ming can no //
translated: It is called “nectar” because it is indivisible like a vajra.

original: mchog ni bla na med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mchog ni bla na med pa nyid kyis so //
translated: It is “supreme” because it is unsurpassed.

original: de bshad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid du gsungs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid du gsungs zhes pa'o //
translated: The explanation of that is: the Blessed One taught just this samādhi.

original: de ni zhes pa ni gang zhig nga yis rtogs pa rgyud gzhan du spas pa de 'dir bshad par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ni zhes pa ni gang zhig nga yis rtogs pa rgyud gzhan du spas pa de 'dir bshad par bya ba ste /
translated: That is, what I have realized is taught here, having been transferred to another continuum.

original: de ni bshad kyis nyon zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: de ni bshad kyis nyon zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
translated: That is explained, so listen!

original: de kho na nyid kyang rang rig pa nyid kyis 'di zhes tshig gis brjod par mi nus pas /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyang rang rig pa nyid kyis 'di zhes tshig gis brjod par mi nus pas /
translated: That reality also cannot be expressed by words as “this” through one’s own awareness.

original: brda'i tshig gis rab tu gsal ba'am snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: brda'i tshig gis rab tu gsal ba'am snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis shes par 'gyur te /
translated: It is clarified by symbolic words or known through the yoga of equipoise.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa yang 'khyud pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba zhes pas 'dir de rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa yang 'khyud pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba zhes pas 'dir de rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, equipoise is preceded by embracing, and so on.

original: don du 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i byed pa'i brdas nye bar longs spyod pa'i sgrub thabs kyang rim par brjod pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: don du 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i byed pa'i brdas nye bar longs spyod pa'i sgrub thabs kyang rim par brjod pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to explain the method of practice for the enjoyment of that, the words of the symbolic actions of embracing, and so on, are stated in sequence.

original: dam du 'khyud cing 'o byas te //
analyzed: dam du 'khyud cing 'o byas te //
translated: Embracing tightly, kissing,

original: 'o la sogs pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: 'o la sogs pa'i de ma thag tu'o //

analyzed: lha mo zhes pa ni bod pa'o //

analyzed: ci zhig 'grub ces pa @57a * //

original: la gsungs pa /
analyzed: la gsungs pa /

analyzed: rgyud ces pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: der de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje bdud rtsi rjod par byed pa /

analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyu de nyid la gzhug ces par dgongs so //

original: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar gsungs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar gsungs par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de nas dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pas snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'o ;

analyzed: ; de las rdo rje bdud rtsi'i de kho na nyid skye zhing so sor gsal ba'i spyod yul du 'gyur te /

analyzed: de ltar 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i byed pa ni rgyas par bstan pas rdo rje bdud rtsi nyid yang dag par rtogs pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid brdas rgyas par bstan pa gsungs pa bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: bdud rtsi'i sgras khu ba'o //

analyzed: la lar rab tu byed pa'i dbang gis sgra ji bzhin par byang chub kyi sems nyid la brjod do //

analyzed: de yis zhes pa ni de'i phyir te de lta bus rnam par bdud rtsi'i yi ges so //

analyzed: 'gro ba gsum gyi ro mo dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: bshad ces pa ni nam bshad par bya zhes pa'o //

analyzed: khyod 'dod don du zhes pa ni khyod 'dod pa'i ched du'o //

analyzed: de ci rgyas par bshad dam zhes pa la gsungs pa /

analyzed: brjod ces pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de nam zhes pa ni de kho na nyid do //

original: de nyid gsungs pa /

analyzed: 'grub ces pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyi dngos grub kyi rang bzhin no //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang bzhin nyid du yang dag par sbyor ba byas nas nga yis de nyid rab tu gsal por bya zhes so //

analyzed: den gsum po 'di dag gi dgongs pa bde blag tu bsdu ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to easily summarize the intention of these three,

analyzed: byang chub sems kyi thig le nyid ni mi 'gyur ba'i yi ge ste /

analyzed: de bzhin du brdas de kho na nyid do //

analyzed: de las yang dag par byung ba ni skyes pa ste ye shes kyi rang rig pa'i tshul gyis so sor gsal ba'o //

analyzed: gang du bha ga'i padma der de bzhin du gsungs pa ste /

analyzed: de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya ba ni phyi nang gi lces reg par bya zhes pa'i don to //

original: de la phyag rgyas 'o bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la phyag rgyas 'o bya ba ni /
translated: There, the kiss with the consort🔽means that.

original: des na mnyam par yang dag par 'o bya zhing gzhib par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: des na mnyam par yang dag par 'o bya zhing gzhib par bya zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag 'byung //

analyzed: 'dir zhes pa ni bstan par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: de nas dgyes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: dgyes zhes pa ni rangs pa'o //

analyzed: de zhes pa ni m'a ma k'i'o //

analyzed: dgyes pa'i rgyu gsungs pa bha ga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: dgyes nas ci zhig byed ces pa la gsungs pa /
translated: What is done after delight? It is stated:

original: zhus zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhus zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Ask,” and so forth.

original: ci zhig zhus zhes pa la dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig zhus zhes pa la dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is asked? It is stated: “maṇḍala,” and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje bdud rtsis so ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi bkod pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje bdud rtsis so ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi bkod pa'o //
translated: The maṇḍala is the arrangement of the deities such as Roma and so forth of Vajra Amṛta.

original: nyes pa mtha' dag dang bral bas yid du 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa mtha' dag dang bral bas yid du 'ong ba'o //
translated: It is pleasing because it is free from all faults.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams dang @58b thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis gsang ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams dang @58b thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is not shared with śrāvakas and so forth.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po 'byung ba'am /
translated: “Vajra Amṛta arises” means the essence of Vajra Amṛta arises,

original: der rdo rje bdud rtsis rab tu bcings pa'o //
analyzed: der rdo rje bdud rtsis rab tu bcings pa'o //
translated: or Vajra Amṛta is well bound there.

original: zhus pa nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhus pa nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The question itself is stated:

original: cho ga dag ni gang zhig gis //
analyzed: cho ga dag ni gang zhig gis //
translated: “By what ritual,”

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: gang zhes pa ni thig gdab pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhes pa ni thig gdab pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “What” refers to the laying out of the maṇḍala, and so forth.

original: cho ga ni chu dang zheng du'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni chu dang zheng du'o //
translated: “Ritual” refers to the width and depth.

original: mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mchod pa la 'jug pa'i rgyur ram /
analyzed: mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mchod pa la 'jug pa'i rgyur ram /
translated: “Worship maṇḍala” means the cause of engaging in worship, or

original: mchod pa byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: mchod pa byed pa nyid do //
translated: the very act of worship.

original: dkyil 'khor ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: “Maṇḍala” is the maṇḍala of worship,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi snying po skye ba'i gzhi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi snying po skye ba'i gzhi'o //
translated: the basis for the arising of the essence of the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: brtsam zhes pa ni ji ltar de nyid kyi rnam pa rdzogs par rab tu brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: brtsam zhes pa ni ji ltar de nyid kyi rnam pa rdzogs par rab tu brtsam par bya'o //
translated: “Begin” means that one should begin in such a way that it is completed.

original: mchod pa zhes pa ni mchod pa'i bye brag gis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa zhes pa ni mchod pa'i bye brag gis mchod par bya'o //
translated: “Worship” means that one should worship with the various types of worship.

original: ji lta bu zhes pa ni ji lta bu'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhes pa ni ji lta bu'i tshul gyis so //
translated: “What” means “in what way.”

original: der zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du'o //🔽sgrub pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams so //
analyzed: der zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du'o // sgrub pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams so //
translated: “There” means “in the maṇḍala.”🔽“Practice” refers to the maṇḍala deities.

original: thabs ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'o ;
analyzed: thabs ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'o ;
translated: “Means” refers to the consecration of the maṇḍala.

original: ; ci rnam pa gang gis dri ba gsum pa 'di rnams ji ltar brjod snyam pa la /
analyzed: ; ci rnam pa gang gis dri ba gsum pa 'di rnams ji ltar brjod snyam pa la /
translated: In what way should these three questions be explained?

original: rang gi bka' drin gyis zhes pa ste 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi bka' drin gyis zhes pa ste 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: By his grace means by his kindness, which is well known in the world.

original: shin tu chags chen ni rdo rje bdud ste //
analyzed: shin tu chags chen ni rdo rje bdud ste //
translated: Great passion means the Vajra Demon.

original: de dag nyid yin pa nyid kyis shin tu chags chen no //
analyzed: de dag nyid yin pa nyid kyis shin tu chags chen no //
translated: They are great passion because of their very nature.

original: rnyed dka' ba zhes pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dus ring pos kyang mi thob pa dang / shin tu chags chen yang de las rnyed par dka' zhes bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: rnyed dka' ba zhes pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dus ring pos kyang mi thob pa dang / shin tu chags chen yang de las rnyed par dka' zhes bsdu ba'o //
translated: The difficult to obtain means that the arising of the Buddha is not obtained even after a long time, and the great passion is also difficult to obtain from that, so it is summarized.

original: da ni lha rnams kyi rim pa dris pa'i lan bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni lha rnams kyi rim pa dris pa'i lan bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach the answer to the question about the sequence of the gods, it is said:

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then the Blessed One, etc.

original: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then means immediately after the request.

original: tu'i sgra ni tshig kha bskang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tu'i sgra ni tshig kha bskang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word tu is for the sake of filling out the meter.

original: bcom ldan zhes pa ni tshig gi don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan zhes pa ni tshig gi don to //
translated: Blessed One is the meaning of the words.

original: de zhes pa ni de kho na nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gang zhig gsungs pa'i rdo rje la byas par gyur pas dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni de kho na nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gang zhig gsungs pa'i rdo rje la byas par gyur pas dgyes pa'o //
translated: That means that which was spoken for the sake of clarifying reality, and it is the Vajra who became delighted.

original: dgyes par gyur pa ni rangs pas cung zad bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes par gyur pa ni rangs pas cung zad bzhad pa'o //
translated: The delighted is the slight smile of joy.

original: d'i zhes pa ni shugs la gnas pa'am 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams so //
analyzed: d'i zhes pa ni shugs la gnas pa'am 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams so //
translated: The etc. includes the resounding and the proclaiming.

original: gsungs zhes pa ni gsung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes pa ni gsung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The said is the future tense of the verb to say.

original: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa /🔽sku gsung thugs ni 'grub don du //
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa / sku gsung thugs ni 'grub don du //
translated: What was said? It is said:

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sku gsung thugs te rdzogs @59a * //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o // sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sku gsung thugs te rdzogs @59a * //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the body, speech, and mind and so forth.

original: par bya ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: par bya ba'i ched du'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the body, speech, and mind of Vajra Amṛta, for the sake of perfecting them.

original: 'khor ba zhes pa ni brgal bar dka' ba nyid kyi 'khor ba nyid ni rgya mtsho ste /🔽rgya mtsho der bying ba'i sems can rnams sgrol ba ni 'grol ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba zhes pa ni brgal bar dka' ba nyid kyi 'khor ba nyid ni rgya mtsho ste / rgya mtsho der bying ba'i sems can rnams sgrol ba ni 'grol ba ste /
translated: The saṃsāra is the ocean of saṃsāra, which is difficult to cross.

original: pha rol gyi 'gram thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'gram thob par byed pa'o //
translated: The liberation of the sentient beings who are drowning in that ocean is the attainment of the other shore.

original: shin tu chags chen zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: shin tu chags chen zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
translated: The great passion is Vajra Amṛta.

original: yang dag sbyor ba ni gang du bsgoms pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag sbyor ba ni gang du bsgoms pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: The correct union is the meditation on that.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni gang zhig 'dir snying po ye shes skye ba des na de kho na nyid la yang dag par gnas zhes dgongs pa'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni gang zhig 'dir snying po ye shes skye ba des na de kho na nyid la yang dag par gnas zhes dgongs pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term “maṇḍala” is that which generates the essence, gnosis, and so the intended meaning is that one should abide in reality.

original: de nyid rgyas par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid rgyas par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to elaborate on that, it is said:

original: gru gsum zhes pa ni zur gsum mo //
analyzed: gru gsum zhes pa ni zur gsum mo //
translated: “Triangle” is three corners.

original: bri zhes pa ni rdul tshon sna lnga'i phye mas bri ba'am /
analyzed: bri zhes pa ni rdul tshon sna lnga'i phye mas bri ba'am /
translated: “Draw” means draw with the powder of the five-colored sand,

original: bris pa dang 'dra bas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bris pa dang 'dra bas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: or meditate on it as if it were drawn.

original: bri bar bya zhes pa ni 'dis bri ba'i tshig gzhan yang bsdu bar bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bri bar bya zhes pa ni 'dis bri ba'i tshig gzhan yang bsdu bar bya zhes pa'o //
translated: “Draw” also includes the other words for drawing.

original: ji lta bu'i rnam pa zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i rnam pa zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: In response to the question, “What kind of form?”

original: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it is said, “secret” and so on.

original: gsang ba'i padma zhes pa ni chos 'byung gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma zhes pa ni chos 'byung gi rnam pa'o //
translated: “Secret lotus” is the form of the dharmodaya.

original: bdag med ces pa ni yang dag par bod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med ces pa ni yang dag par bod pa'o //
translated: “Selfless” is the correct drawing.

original: ci zhig bri bar bya zhes pa la padma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig bri bar bya zhes pa la padma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In response to the question, “What should be drawn?” it is said, “lotus” and so on.

original: bya zhes pa ni thog mar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa yang dag par bri ba'o //
analyzed: bya zhes pa ni thog mar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa yang dag par bri ba'o //
translated: “Draw” means first draw an eight-petaled lotus.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhes pa la ge sar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhes pa la ge sar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is its distinction? He says, “with stamens,” and so on.

original: ge sar zhes pa logs kyi 'dab ma rnams so //
analyzed: ge sar zhes pa logs kyi 'dab ma rnams so //
translated: “ Stamens” are the petals on the sides.

original: glu gsum gyis sbas pas gsang ba ni mi mngon pa'o //
analyzed: glu gsum gyis sbas pas gsang ba ni mi mngon pa'o //
translated: “ Hidden by the three songs” is not manifest.

original: gang zhig logs kyi ge sar des bkag pas na mi mthong ba'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: gang zhig logs kyi ge sar des bkag pas na mi mthong ba'i spyod yul lo //
translated: “ That which is obstructed by those stamens on the sides is not seen.”

original: ge sra ni lte ba'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: ge sra ni lte ba'i spyod yul lo //
translated: “ Stamens” is the domain of the navel.

original: dbus su zhes pa ni 'di lta bu'i 'phar ma gcig pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su zhes pa ni 'di lta bu'i 'phar ma gcig pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: “ In the center” means that such a single whorl should be drawn.

original: de'i dbus su rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhag par bya zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhag par bya zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach that Vajra Amṛta should be placed in its center, he says:

original: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “In its center,” and so on.

original: de'i zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor dbus so //
analyzed: de'i zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor dbus so //
translated: “ In its center” is the center of the maṇḍala.

original: nga zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: nga zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
translated: “ I” is Vajra Amṛta.

original: rig ces pa ni shes par bya zhing rnam par brtag par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rig ces pa ni shes par bya zhing rnam par brtag par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: “ Knowledge” means that it should be known and contemplated.

original: ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: What is it like? He says:

original: zhal gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ Three faces,” and so on.

original: pri yang ku lta bu dang dkar po dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: pri yang ku lta bu dang dkar po dang dmar po'o //
translated: and white and red.

original: kha dog ste gang gi zhal gsum po de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: kha dog ste gang gi zhal gsum po de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: The colors of the three faces are stated as they are.

original: rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang dril bu dang / lcags kyu dang zhags pa ste mtshon cha rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang dril bu dang / lcags kyu dang zhags pa ste mtshon cha rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with the weapons, the vajra, wheel, sword, bell, goad, and noose.

original: gang gi phyag gdub yin pa de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyag gdub yin pa de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: The one who has armlets is stated as such.

original: gtso bo zhes @59b pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes @59b pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
translated: The principal one is the lord of the mandala.

original: zhal rnams rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhal rnams rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the faces in detail, he says:

original: dkar min zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkar min zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Not white,” etc.

original: dang po'i zhal ni dkar min zhes pa ni pri yang ku lta bu'i mdog go //
analyzed: dang po'i zhal ni dkar min zhes pa ni pri yang ku lta bu'i mdog go //
translated: The first face is “not white,” the color of a priyaṅgu flower.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni dkar po dmar po'o //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni dkar po dmar po'o //
translated: The right and left faces are white and red.

original: lha'i rgyan gyis kun du brgyan //
analyzed: lha'i rgyan gyis kun du brgyan //
translated: Adorned with all the ornaments of a god.

original: zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni ;
translated: This is stated as:

original: rdo rje'i gtsug tor dang / nor bu'i cod pan dang / ska rags dang / dpung rgyan dang / rkang rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis kun du brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gtsug tor dang / nor bu'i cod pan dang / ska rags dang / dpung rgyan dang / rkang rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis kun du brgyan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with all the ornaments, such as the vajra crest, the gem diadem, the girdle, the armlets, the anklets, and so on.

original: lha'i phreng ba zhes pa ni aa mri ta ka'i me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i phreng ba zhes pa ni aa mri ta ka'i me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The divine garland is the garland of amrita flowers.

original: gos zhes pa ni sna tshogs bkra ba'i gos 'dzin pa'o //🔽lha'i dri zhes pa ni rje'i tshig 'dis gur gum ste /
analyzed: gos zhes pa ni sna tshogs bkra ba'i gos 'dzin pa'o // lha'i dri zhes pa ni rje'i tshig 'dis gur gum ste /
translated: The garment is the variegated garment.🔽 The divine fragrance is saffron.

original: lha'i dri'i gur gum des byugs pa'i don to //
analyzed: lha'i dri'i gur gum des byugs pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is anointed with divine saffron fragrance.

original: 'dis ni gzhan du mdog ser por bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni gzhan du mdog ser por bstan to //
translated: This indicates the yellow color elsewhere.

original: sngon du kha dog nag po brjod pa ni lha'i dri brjod pa'i don te pri yang ku lta bu'i kha dog ces gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sngon du kha dog nag po brjod pa ni lha'i dri brjod pa'i don te pri yang ku lta bu'i kha dog ces gsungs pa'o //
translated: The statement of the black color first is for the sake of stating the divine fragrance, as it is said to have the color of priyangu.

original: lhag ma'i lha rnams rigs gsum gyi rnam pa'i don du sngon du zhal nag po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: lhag ma'i lha rnams rigs gsum gyi rnam pa'i don du sngon du zhal nag po zhes gsungs so //
translated: For the sake of the meaning of the three families, the other deities are stated first as having a black face.

original: lha'i dri zhes pa 'dis ni gzhan ser po dang ljang gu'i kha dog gnyis bsdus te /
analyzed: lha'i dri zhes pa 'dis ni gzhan ser po dang ljang gu'i kha dog gnyis bsdus te /
translated: This divine fragrance includes the other two colors, yellow and green.

original: de bsdus pa las dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho gar rdul tshon lnga nges par mdzad do //
analyzed: de bsdus pa las dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho gar rdul tshon lnga nges par mdzad do //
translated: In the Compendium of Principles, he definitely uses five colored powders in the rites of the mandala and so forth.

original: gang zhig le'u lnga par m'a ma k'i'i phyag tu gnas pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de nyid rdo rje bdud rtsi dang zla ba ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams sbyin par bya zhes don gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig le'u lnga par m'a ma k'i'i phyag tu gnas pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de nyid rdo rje bdud rtsi dang zla ba ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams sbyin par bya zhes don gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the meaning of the statement that the very same symbolic hand gestures of the vajra and so forth that are held in the hands of Māmakī in the fifth chapter are given to the deities such as Vajra Amṛta and Candrota.

original: lha'i dngos grub byed pa zhes pa la lha'i dngos grub ni lha la rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub po //
analyzed: lha'i dngos grub byed pa zhes pa la lha'i dngos grub ni lha la rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub po //
translated: With regard to “accomplishing the feats of the deities,” the feat of the deities is the feat of yoga with the deities.

original: de rnams byed pa ni ster bar byed pa ste lha'i dngos grub byed pa ni dngos grub kyi gtso bor dgongs so //
analyzed: de rnams byed pa ni ster bar byed pa ste lha'i dngos grub byed pa ni dngos grub kyi gtso bor dgongs so //
translated: Accomplishing them is bestowing them; that is, accomplishing the feats of the deities is considered to be the principal feat.

original: zhi zhes pa ni zhi zhing ldan na phyag mtshan bstan /
analyzed: zhi zhes pa ni zhi zhing ldan na phyag mtshan bstan /
translated: “Peace” is peacefulness.

original: ci'i phyir ma bstan snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal sgeg pa'i ro'o //🔽sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma bstan snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal sgeg pa'i ro'o // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
translated: If one wonders why the symbolic hand gestures are not taught, this is to dispel doubts.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: The one who possesses the vajra of body, speech, and mind🔽is the one who possesses the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: rigs gsum dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid ces pa'i don no //
analyzed: rigs gsum dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid ces pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that he is the nature of the three families inseparable.

original: cung zad dmar ba lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //🔽dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dgod pa bstan nas phyi'i 'phar ma bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: cung zad dmar ba lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o // dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dgod pa bstan nas phyi'i 'phar ma bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: He has a halo of light that is slightly red, and he sits in the cross-legged posture of a bodhisattva on a circle of nectar.

original: phyi'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having taught the placement of the lord of the maṇḍala, in order to teach the outer enclosure, [the Bhagavān] declares, “The outer,” and so on.

original: de'i zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi'o //
translated: “There” means in the triangular maṇḍala.

original: phyi ni phyi rol te gru bzhi sgo bzhi par brtag pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ni phyi rol te gru bzhi sgo bzhi par brtag pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi de kho na nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi de kho na nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ Blessed One, my reality, ” etc.

original: bdag gi de kho na nyid ces pa ni khyod kyi de kho na nyid de snying po'i ye shes zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bdag gi de kho na nyid ces pa ni khyod kyi de kho na nyid de snying po'i ye shes zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: “ My reality ” is your reality, up to “the wisdom of the essence. ”

original: de khyad par ji lta bu zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: de khyad par ji lta bu zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: What is its distinction? He says:

original: byang chub sems zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ enlightenment spirit, ” etc.

original: byang chub kyi sems ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: Enlightenment spirit is emptiness.

original: de'i rnam par 'phrul ba ni byang chub kyi spyod pas de gang yin pa de ni de skad du gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'phrul ba ni byang chub kyi spyod pas de gang yin pa de ni de skad du gsungs so //
translated: Its emanation is the practice of enlightenment. That which is that is said thus.

original: phra zhes pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: phra zhes pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: Subtle means subtle yoga.

original: ches phra ni shin tu yang yul rnams las log pa'o //
analyzed: ches phra ni shin tu yang yul rnams las log pa'o //
translated: Subtler than the subtle means even more turned away from objects.

original: sems rtse gcig tu byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ye shes so //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig tu byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ye shes so //
translated: The samadhi of one-pointed mind is wisdom.

original: yang gzhig pa'i dus kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni mu stegs pas de kho na nyid du brjod de de'i phyir phra ba'i rdul las kyang ches phra ba ni chos kyi sku ste shin tu yang phra bar gnas pa nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: yang gzhig pa'i dus kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni mu stegs pas de kho na nyid du brjod de de'i phyir phra ba'i rdul las kyang ches phra ba ni chos kyi sku ste shin tu yang phra bar gnas pa nyid kyis sam /
translated: Moreover, the subtle particles at the time of destruction are said by the tirthikas to be reality. Therefore, subtler than the subtle particle is the dharmakaya, abiding as extremely subtle.

original: rtsa'i khong stong gi rdul nyid kyang phra ba'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i khong stong gi rdul nyid kyang phra ba'o //
translated: The subtle particles of the empty channels are also subtle.

original: 'dra ba las 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'dra ste rgyun mi 'chad pas na mi zad pas so //
analyzed: 'dra ba las 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'dra ste rgyun mi 'chad pas na mi zad pas so //
translated: From a similar cause, a similar result arises, and since the continuum is uninterrupted, it is inexhaustible.

original: gzung @66b ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas stong pas so //
analyzed: gzung @66b ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas stong pas so //
translated: Since it is empty, free from apprehended and apprehender,

original: cung zad kyang bsal ba'am gzhag pa med pa nyid kyis 'bri ba med pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad kyang bsal ba'am gzhag pa med pa nyid kyis 'bri ba med pa'o //
translated: it is without decrease, since nothing is removed or added.

original: gang zhig de lta bur gyur pa'i 'gro ba'i grong du ji ltar gnas zhes pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: gang zhig de lta bur gyur pa'i 'gro ba'i grong du ji ltar gnas zhes pa gsungs pa la /
translated: How does one abide in the city of migrating beings that is like that?

original: ji ltar ro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar ro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: How?

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'dis de kho na nyid dang bcings pa dang thar pa dang gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'gags pa dang / skye ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa don du mar 'dod do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'dis de kho na nyid dang bcings pa dang thar pa dang gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'gags pa dang / skye ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa don du mar 'dod do //
translated: By this vajra statement, the nature of reality, bondage, liberation, abiding, cessation, arising, the various fruitions of virtue and nonvirtue, and so on are asserted to be multiple.

original: ji ltar zhes pa ni gang gi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa ni gang gi tshul gyis so //
translated: How is it? In what manner?

original: 'di zhes pa ni de ma thag tu ngas bsngags shing bstod pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa ni de ma thag tu ngas bsngags shing bstod pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: This is the reality that I just praised and extolled.

original: de zhes pa ni srid pa gsum gyi nang na gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni srid pa gsum gyi nang na gnas pa rnams so //
translated: Those are those who abide within the three existences.

original: lus ni lus la'o //
analyzed: lus ni lus la'o //
translated: The body is in the body.

original: rol pa ni khyad par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rol pa ni khyad par gnas pa ste /
translated: Play is a special abiding.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba nye bar longs spyod pas 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten gzhan du sna tshogs pa'i 'gro bar 'pho zhing lus gtong ba dang / lus yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs pa la rol pas longs spyod ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba nye bar longs spyod pas 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten gzhan du sna tshogs pa'i 'gro bar 'pho zhing lus gtong ba dang / lus yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs pa la rol pas longs spyod ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of enjoyment is that by the enjoyment of virtue and non-virtue, one enjoys the various transmigrations in this world and the next world, the giving up of the body and the taking up of the body, and so on.

original: dbang po gnyis zhes pa ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po ste de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mig la sogs pa'i dbang po sna tshogs pa'i rten te /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis zhes pa ni bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po ste de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mig la sogs pa'i dbang po sna tshogs pa'i rten te /
translated: The two organs are the female organ and the male organ. By the power of those, there are various supports for the eye and other organs.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: It is because of their nature.

original: yul mtha' dag la ji ltar nye bar longs spyod snyam pa la ;
analyzed: yul mtha' dag la ji ltar nye bar longs spyod snyam pa la ;
translated: How is there enjoyment of all objects?

original: spyod ces pa ste yul dang yul can nye bar brtags nas longs spyod de dbang po gnyis kyi longs spyod ces gsungs so //
analyzed: spyod ces pa ste yul dang yul can nye bar brtags nas longs spyod de dbang po gnyis kyi longs spyod ces gsungs so //
translated: It is said that there is enjoyment by the examination of the object and the subject. That is the enjoyment of the two organs.

original: 'di la zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dang 'gro ba mtha' dag gi skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di la zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dang 'gro ba mtha' dag gi skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams so //
translated: Here means in reality, and in all the births and deaths of the world.

original: the tshom ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Doubt is a discursive thought.

original: de thob pa ni thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de thob pa ni thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: Its attainment is its occurrence.

original: hi'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: hi'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The word hi means “because.”

original: gang gi phyir nga yis the tshom thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir the tshom dang bral bar bya ba'i don du de kho na nyid bskyed pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bya ba shes par mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nga yis the tshom thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir the tshom dang bral bar bya ba'i don du de kho na nyid bskyed pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bya ba shes par mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Because I have attained doubt, therefore, in order to be free from doubt, you should understand the activity of the distinctions of the generation of reality and so forth.

original: mchog ni shin tu'o //
analyzed: mchog ni shin tu'o //
translated: Supreme means very.

original: bdag ni ngo mtshar bas 'dod ces pa lhag pa'o ;
analyzed: bdag ni ngo mtshar bas 'dod ces pa lhag pa'o ;
translated: I am desirous of the marvelous.

original: ; zhus pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ; zhus pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to respond to the question, he says:

original: bka' stsal zhes pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa'i sgra ni dris pa rdzogs nas so //
analyzed: bka' stsal zhes pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa'i sgra ni dris pa rdzogs nas so //
translated: The statement “it was said” and so forth. The word “said” is when the question is complete.

original: bka' stsal zhes pa ni tshig gis so //
analyzed: bka' stsal zhes pa ni tshig gis so //
translated: “It was said” is by the words.

original: gang gi tshig gis zhes pa la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gang gi tshig gis zhes pa la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: “By whose words?” is by the Bhagavān and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni @67a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni @67a * //
translated: The Bhagavān is

original: shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: endowed with wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje can no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje can no //
translated: The five-pronged vajra of intuition refers to the vajrin.

original: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas so //
translated: It is indivisible like a vajra.

original: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The nectar is nirvana.

original: bde ba ni yid bde ba nyid kyis rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni yid bde ba nyid kyis rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che'o //
translated: The bliss is the great bliss of vajra-nectar, because of the very delight of the mind.

original: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: What did he say?

original: de kho na nyid bdag ma ni lha rnams kyi rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bdag ma ni lha rnams kyi rnal 'byor te /
translated: The truth-body is the yoga of the deities.

original: de'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'o //
translated: It is arisen from the imagination of that.

original: yang na rnal 'byor ni de kho na nyid kyi khyad par te de rnam par rtogs par bya ba'i don du gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor ni de kho na nyid kyi khyad par te de rnam par rtogs par bya ba'i don du gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: Or, yoga is the special truth, and it is arisen for the purpose of the imagination of that, for the purpose of the manifestation of that.

original: shin tu phra zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i nang khong stong ste /
analyzed: shin tu phra zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i nang khong stong ste /
translated: The very subtle is the inner void of the root.

original: dga' ba la sogs pa'i tshul nyid kyis de mtshon par dka' ba nyid de ni phra ba nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa'i tshul nyid kyis de mtshon par dka' ba nyid de ni phra ba nyid du gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be subtle because it is difficult to illustrate by the method of delight, etc.

original: gsang ba zhes pa ni gsang bar ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa ni gsang bar ma byas pa'o //
translated: The secret is not a secret.

original: shes dang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: shes dang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the yogi's consciousness is called knowledge.

original: shes bya zhes pa ni shes pa de nyid kyi yul gyi rang bzhin no //🔽'jig pa med pas na zad med do //
analyzed: shes bya zhes pa ni shes pa de nyid kyi yul gyi rang bzhin no // 'jig pa med pas na zad med do //
translated: The nature of the object of that knowledge is called knowable.🔽Since there is no destruction, it is inexhaustible.

original: cung zad kyang bsal bar bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba med pas na 'bri ba med do //
analyzed: cung zad kyang bsal bar bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba med pas na 'bri ba med do //
translated: Since there is nothing to be removed or established, it is not diminished.

original: rtag pa'i rdzas med par gsungs pa nyid kyis na rtag med do //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rdzas med par gsungs pa nyid kyis na rtag med do //
translated: Since it is said to be without permanent substance, it is not permanent.

original: thog min zhes pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
