original: khyod kyis kyang ji ltar bstan pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang ji ltar bstan pa zhes pa la /
translated: And you also, as taught,

original: rang gis bstan pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang gis bstan pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: he states the reason for his teaching:

original: shin tu chags pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu chags pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “very attached,” etc.

original: nga yis bshad ces pa 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: nga yis bshad ces pa 'dir 'brel to //
translated: “I have explained” is connected here.

original: chags pa'i bde bas zhes pa ni 'dod pa thams cad la bde bar longs spyod pa /
analyzed: chags pa'i bde bas zhes pa ni 'dod pa thams cad la bde bar longs spyod pa /
translated: “The bliss of attachment” is the enjoyment of bliss in all desires.

original: bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyi snod can gyi 'jig rten pa la zhes pa ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyi snod can gyi 'jig rten pa la zhes pa ste /
translated: “The vessel of the yoga of nectar” is the world.

original: gtan tshigs kyi gsum pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third reason.

original: mchog gi rnal 'byor rab gsal byas pa ni //
analyzed: mchog gi rnal 'byor rab gsal byas pa ni //
translated: “Having made manifest the supreme yoga,”

original: gong du de ma thag gi brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gong du de ma thag gi brjod pa nyid do //
translated: is the very statement just above.

original: gsang ba'i padma ni khyod kyi chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma ni khyod kyi chos 'byung ngo //
translated: “The secret lotus” is your dharmodaya.

original: lta ba yang de la'o //
analyzed: lta ba yang de la'o //
translated: “The view” is also in that.

original: shin tu stug pa'i sha dang ldan pa ste padma'i 'dab ma sbom pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu stug pa'i sha dang ldan pa ste padma'i 'dab ma sbom pa'o //

original: yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i lta ba'i rgyus de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i lta ba'i rgyus de kho na nyid do //
translated: The view of the yoga of meditation on the correct union is reality.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che ba'i rgyud ngas bshad cing rab tu gsal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che ba'i rgyud ngas bshad cing rab tu gsal bar byas pa'o //
translated: I have explained and clarified the Vajra Amṛta Mahāsukha Tantra.

original: de gsungs par 'gyur ba rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chos kyi snod dang ldan pa'i sems can mthong nas /
analyzed: de gsungs par 'gyur ba rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chos kyi snod dang ldan pa'i sems can mthong nas /
translated: Having seen sentient beings who are vessels for the Dharma of Vajra Amṛta,

original: khyod kyi padma lta bu'i gsol ba 'debs par byed pa des na ngas kyang bshad ces pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi padma lta bu'i gsol ba 'debs par byed pa des na ngas kyang bshad ces pa'o //
translated: you have supplicated like a lotus. Therefore, I will explain.

original: m'a ma k'is rang dgar brtsams pa ni ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: m'a ma k'is rang dgar brtsams pa ni ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /

original: rdo rje can gyis gsungs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis gsungs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Vajra Holder spoke, etc.

original: rgyas par bstan pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyas par bstan pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
translated: In terms of the extensive explanation, it is said:

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: rgyas par bstan pa'i ming gsungs pa //
analyzed: rgyas par bstan pa'i ming gsungs pa //
translated: The name of the extensive explanation is stated:

original: de kho na nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Reality, etc.

original: de kho na nyid ces pa ni dbyangs dang bral ba'i ha yig snying gar ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces pa ni dbyangs dang bral ba'i ha yig snying gar ro //
translated: The reality is the letter HA devoid of vowels, in the heart.

original: des na rnal 'byor ni dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: des na rnal 'byor ni dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
translated: Thus, yoga is the meditation on the mandala.

original: de'i ye shes ni de'i rnam pa ste de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni de'i rnam pa ste de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi ye shes so //
translated: Its knowledge is its form, the knowledge of the yoga of reality.

original: gzhung gang gis de rgyas par bstan pa de nyid ni de bzhin du brjod ces pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung gang gis de rgyas par bstan pa de nyid ni de bzhin du brjod ces pa'o //
translated: The text which teaches that extensively is just so.

original: le'u gnyis pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the second chapter.

original: // / da ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi rtsa ba'i sngags rnams shes par 'dod pas /
analyzed: // / da ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi rtsa ba'i sngags rnams shes par 'dod pas /
translated: Now, wishing to know the root mantras of the mandala deities,🔽[the Bhagavān] is supplicated with the song of Māmakī.

original: m'a ma @73b k'i'i glu yis gsol ba 'debs par byed ces gsungs pa /🔽de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: m'a ma @73b k'i'i glu yis gsol ba 'debs par byed ces gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares,

original: de nas zhes pa ni gnyis pa bstan pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni gnyis pa bstan pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then, immediately after the teaching of the second [chapter].

original: dgyes zhes pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pas de yang dag par dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes zhes pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pas de yang dag par dgyes pa'o //
translated: Pleased means that he is truly pleased by the realization of reality.

original: lha mo de zhes pa m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: lha mo de zhes pa m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The goddess is Māmakī.

original: dpung rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas so //
analyzed: dpung rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas so //
translated: Adorned with ornaments such as armlets, she.

original: dgyes par byed ces pa ni dgyes pa skyed par ro //
analyzed: dgyes par byed ces pa ni dgyes pa skyed par ro //
translated: “Pleased” means to generate pleasure.🔽What is to be pleased?

original: gang zhig dgyes par bya zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang zhig dgyes par bya zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Him” and so forth.

original: de zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud ston pa po'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud ston pa po'o //
translated: “Him” is the teacher of the Vajra Amṛta Tantra.

original: sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The “great being” is the nature of the elixir of enlightenment.

original: sems dpa'i sems gang yin pa de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: sems dpa'i sems gang yin pa de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: The “mind of the being” is said to be just that.🔽By what is he pleased?

original: gang gis dgyes par byed ces pa la /
analyzed: gang gis dgyes par byed ces pa la /
translated: It is said:

original: glu blangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: glu blangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Song” and so forth.

original: glu zhes pa ni lha rnams la yang dag par ma mnga' ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: glu zhes pa ni lha rnams la yang dag par ma mnga' ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
translated: “Song” is praise through the door of qualities not possessed by the gods.

original: 'di yis zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o//
analyzed: 'di yis zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o//
translated: “By this” refers to what will be explained.

original: gang gis ci zhig byas nas dgyes par bya zhes pa la glu blangs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gang gis ci zhig byas nas dgyes par bya zhes pa la glu blangs zhes pa ni /
translated: By what is he pleased? It is said:

analyzed: dbyangs sna tshogs snyoms par 'jug pa glu mkhan gyi bye brag ste /
translated: “Song” is a particular kind of singer who engages in various melodies.

original: phun sum tshogs par byed do //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs par byed do //
translated: It is perfect.

original: de la glu gsungs grol zhing grol ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la glu gsungs grol zhing grol ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The song to him is Liberated and liberated, and so on.

original: shin tu chags pa la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid so sor snang ba rdzogs pa dang / de yongs su shes pa'i nges pa la sogs 'dir gsungs so //
analyzed: shin tu chags pa la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid so sor snang ba rdzogs pa dang / de yongs su shes pa'i nges pa la sogs 'dir gsungs so //
translated: By entering into union with her, who is extremely passionate, his great passion is perfected, and the certainty of understanding that is taught here, and so on.

original: grol zhing grol zhes pa ni shin tu chags pa'i bya ba yongs su btang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: grol zhing grol zhes pa ni shin tu chags pa'i bya ba yongs su btang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Liberated and liberated means giving up the activity of extreme passion.

original: bdud rtsi grol ba 'dis ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi grol ba 'dis ni rdo rje'o //
translated: This is the vajra of liberated nectar.

original: bde chen zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: bde chen zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: Great bliss is the kiss.

original: la lar nyon cig nyon zhes pa'i tshig yod do //
analyzed: la lar nyon cig nyon zhes pa'i tshig yod do //
translated: In some [texts], there is the word listen.

original: shin tu chags pa'i bya ba yongs su gtong ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: shin tu chags pa'i bya ba yongs su gtong ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The cause of giving up the activity of extreme passion is taught:

original: shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Understand, and so on.

original: shes zhes pa ni yang dag par shes pas so //
analyzed: shes zhes pa ni yang dag par shes pas so //
translated: Understand is by right understanding.

original: nga yis zhes pa ni nga yis so //
analyzed: nga yis zhes pa ni nga yis so //
translated: My is mine.

original: ci zhig shes zhes pa la don dam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig shes zhes pa la don dam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is understood? Ultimate, and so on.

original: don dam zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi man ngag mi slu ba nyid do //
analyzed: don dam zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi man ngag mi slu ba nyid do //
translated: The ultimate is the non-deceptive instruction on reality.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach that, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: gnas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The place,” and so on.

original: gnas zhes pa ni bde ba zhes pa'i 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: gnas zhes pa ni bde ba zhes pa'i 'dir 'brel to //
translated: The place is connected here with “bliss.”

original: gang du gnas zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang du gnas zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: As for “where,” [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: bha ga zhes pa la sogs @74a * //
analyzed: bha ga zhes pa la sogs @74a * //
translated: “The bhaga,” and so on.

original: pa'o ; ; dri ma med par 'dod pa nyid kyis padma ste der gnas pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; ; dri ma med par 'dod pa nyid kyis padma ste der gnas pa'o //
translated: Since it is desired to be stainless, it is a lotus, and that is the place.

original: dbyer med ces pa ni bdud rtsi dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis bdud rtsi zhu bar gcig tu gyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dbyer med ces pa ni bdud rtsi dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis bdud rtsi zhu bar gcig tu gyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: “Inseparable” means that, in the manner of inseparable nectar, it is a single taste of melted nectar.

original: bde ba zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rgyu can te /
analyzed: bde ba zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rgyu can te /
translated: “Bliss” is the cause of unsurpassed bliss.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po'o //
translated: It is the essence of vajra nectar.

original: de nyid 'di gang gi zhes pa la rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'di gang gi zhes pa la rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That very thing is “this,” and “whose” is declared with “vajra,” and so on.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i'o //
translated: It is of the vajra nectar.

original: 'di zhes pa ni de kho na nyid 'di'o //🔽mdzes zhes pa ni don te /
analyzed: 'di zhes pa ni de kho na nyid 'di'o // mdzes zhes pa ni don te /
translated: “This” is this reality.🔽“Beautiful” is the meaning.

original: mdzes zhes pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: mdzes zhes pa'i bar du ste /
translated: Up to “beautiful,”

original: bdud rtsi zhu ba dbyer med pa'i tshul ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhu ba dbyer med pa'i tshul ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence of vajra nectar is the way of the indivisibility of the melted nectar.

original: bha ga'i padmar gnas pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes gsungs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bha ga'i padmar gnas pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes gsungs par 'gyur te /
translated: The nature of wisdom is said to abide in the lotus of the bhaga.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las bzhengs pa'i glu 'dis zhes bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las bzhengs pa'i glu 'dis zhes bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the summary: “arisen from the nature of emptiness.”

original: glu 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: glu 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: The application of this song is stated:

original: glu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: glu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “song” and so forth.

original: glu zhes pa ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: glu zhes pa ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa ste /
translated: “Song” is what was just stated.

original: glu'i rab tu sbyor bas glu blang bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: glu'i rab tu sbyor bas glu blang bar bya ba ni /
translated: The song that is to be sung by the application of the song

original: phun sum tshogs par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: is to be done perfectly, is the meaning of the statement.

original: de la rab tu sbyor ba rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la rab tu sbyor ba rnams gsungs pa /
translated: The applications there are stated:

original: 'jam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “softly” and so forth.

original: 'jam pa'i zhes pa ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i zhes pa ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Softly” is endowed with the particularities of softness and sweetness.

original: sgra ni sgra dbyangs kyis te snyan pa nyid kyis mgrin pa'i yon tan gsungs so //
analyzed: sgra ni sgra dbyangs kyis te snyan pa nyid kyis mgrin pa'i yon tan gsungs so //
translated: “Sound” is by means of the sound tone, and by means of sweetness, the quality of the throat is stated.

original: ma ra na tra tar zhes pa 'dis ni dbyangs kyi gnas rnams gsungs te /
analyzed: ma ra na tra tar zhes pa 'dis ni dbyangs kyi gnas rnams gsungs te /
translated: The words mara natra tara indicate the places of the vowels.

original: snying gar chud pa'i rab tu sbyor bas ni mantra'o //
analyzed: snying gar chud pa'i rab tu sbyor bas ni mantra'o //
translated: By the application of man in the heart, there is mantra.

original: mgo bor gnas pa'i sbyor bas ta ra'o //
analyzed: mgo bor gnas pa'i sbyor bas ta ra'o //
translated: By the application of ta in the head, there is tara.

original: ka ka la zhes pa ni gnyis su thos pas brjod pa ste /
analyzed: ka ka la zhes pa ni gnyis su thos pas brjod pa ste /
translated: The word kaka is expressed by the hearing of two [sounds].

original: 'dod pa rdzogs pa ni dbyangs te /
analyzed: 'dod pa rdzogs pa ni dbyangs te /
translated: The fulfillment of desire is the vowel.

original: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor du dbyangs rnams mchog tu bsngags pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor du dbyangs rnams mchog tu bsngags pa'o //
translated: The vowels are praised as supreme in the maṇḍala of vowels.

original: gcig rdzogs par rab tu ston pa ni drug ldan du yang gsungs so //
analyzed: gcig rdzogs par rab tu ston pa ni drug ldan du yang gsungs so //
translated: The teaching of the completion of one is also said to be the six-fold [practice].

original: gnyis su thos pa mchog yin te /
analyzed: gnyis su thos pa mchog yin te /
translated: The hearing of two is supreme,

original: rdzogs pa ka ka la yin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa ka ka la yin no //
translated: the completion is kaka.

original: zhes so // de yang pi wang gi rgyud la sor mo'i rtse mos dal bus brdabs nas shin tu gsal ba ma yin pa ni ta ra'i dbyangs su mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de yang pi wang gi rgyud la sor mo'i rtse mos dal bus brdabs nas shin tu gsal ba ma yin pa ni ta ra'i dbyangs su mtshon par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the slow striking of the strings of a vīṇā with the tips of the fingers, not very clearly, should be illustrated as the sound of tara.

original: 'jam pa'i sgras mantra dang / ta ra dang / ka ka la rnams brjod pa'i gnas kyis blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i sgras mantra dang / ta ra dang / ka ka la rnams brjod pa'i gnas kyis blang bar bya'o //
translated: The sounds of mantra, tara, and kaka should be taken up by the place of articulation with a soft sound.

original: drug ldan la sogs pa grong ba'i chags pas glu blang bar bya zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: drug ldan la sogs pa grong ba'i chags pas glu blang bar bya zhes gsungs pa /
translated: One should sing songs with the six-fold and so on, with the attachment of the village.

original: drug ldan la sogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: drug ldan la sogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The and so on refers to the six-fold and so on.

original: drug ldan ni gcig @74b go ;
analyzed: drug ldan ni gcig @74b go ;
translated: The six-fold is one.

original: ; sogs pa'i sgras ka ku bha dan /
analyzed: ; sogs pa'i sgras ka ku bha dan /
translated: The and so on refers to the Kakubha,

original: pan tsi pi dang / ke si ka dang / ta ka ra la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pan tsi pi dang / ke si ka dang / ta ka ra la sogs pa'o //
translated: the Pañcika, the Kesika, the Takkara, and so on.

original: tu'i sgras ni'am gyi don to //
analyzed: tu'i sgras ni'am gyi don to //
translated: The word tu has the meaning of or.

original: thun mong gis kyang glu blang bar bya zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: thun mong gis kyang glu blang bar bya zhes gsungs pa /
translated: One should sing songs with the common as well.

original: sna sogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sna sogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The and so on refers to the nose and so on.

original: sna sogs ni shin tu yang 'jam zhing snyan pa'o //
analyzed: sna sogs ni shin tu yang 'jam zhing snyan pa'o //
translated: The nose and so on are very soft and sweet.

original: thun mong zhes pa ni drug ldan la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi bye brag gzhan ni sgra'i khyad par te zhes glu blang bar bya ste de ni thun mong gi ming de yang me tog thun mong gi dus su 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: thun mong zhes pa ni drug ldan la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi bye brag gzhan ni sgra'i khyad par te zhes glu blang bar bya ste de ni thun mong gi ming de yang me tog thun mong gi dus su 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The common is the other particular of the six-fold and so on, which is a particular of sound, and one should sing songs. That is the common name. That is also the time of the common flower, which is the nature of passion.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is also said:

original: dgun gyi gnas ni byung ba dang // dpyid kyi dus dag 'ong ba ru //
analyzed: dgun gyi gnas ni byung ba dang // dpyid kyi dus dag 'ong ba ru //
translated: The winter season has passed, and the spring season has come.

original: grang zhing dro dus chags pa yi //
analyzed: grang zhing dro dus chags pa yi //
translated: The cold and hot seasons are connected.

original: bdag nyid thun mong ba ni zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid thun mong ba ni zhes pa'o //
translated: The common nature is the forest with flowers.

original: yang na sna tshogs 'di rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: yang na sna tshogs 'di rdo rje bdud rtsi'o //
translated: Or, this variety is the vajra nectar.

original: de'i thun mong ba ni me tog yod pa'i nags te /
analyzed: de'i thun mong ba ni me tog yod pa'i nags te /
translated: Its commonality is the forest with flowers.

original: rtag par dpyid ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: rtag par dpyid ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
translated: Spring is the group of desire and so forth.

original: de gsungs par gyur pa /
analyzed: de gsungs par gyur pa /
translated: That is stated.

original: gzhan gyi rab tu sbyor ba yis ;
analyzed: gzhan gyi rab tu sbyor ba yis ;
translated: By the application of others,

original: ; glu dag blang bar byas pa yin //
analyzed: ; glu dag blang bar byas pa yin //
translated: the songs are sung.

original: zhes pa'o // de la glu 'di'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de la glu 'di'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: Therein, the result of this song is stated:🔽By this,

original: 'dis ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: 'dis zhes pa la sogs pa ni glus so //
analyzed: 'dis zhes pa la sogs pa ni glus so //
translated: By this, and so forth, is the song.🔽Sung is praised.

original: blangs zhes pa ni bstod pa ste sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub ces pa gnas 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: blangs zhes pa ni bstod pa ste sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub ces pa gnas 'dir 'brel to //
translated: The accomplishment of buddhahood is connected to this place.

original: 'dod chags ni shin tu chags par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni shin tu chags par gyur pa'o //
translated: Desire is the state of being very attached.

original: mchog tu gyur ba'i gnas skabs kyi bde ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur ba'i gnas skabs kyi bde ba'o //
translated: The bliss of the state of being supreme.

original: de dag gi rnam 'phrul gyi don ni gang gis byin gyis brlabs pa de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: de dag gi rnam 'phrul gyi don ni gang gis byin gyis brlabs pa de ni de bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of their emanations is that which is blessed is said to be just that.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis de ni rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis de ni rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che ba'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of Vajra Amṛta Great Bliss, it is Vajra Amṛta Great Bliss.

original: glus bstod par byas na gsol ba gdab par bya zhes gsungs pa la mchod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: glus bstod par byas na gsol ba gdab par bya zhes gsungs pa la mchod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If one praises with songs, one should request.

original: mchod ces pa ni gsol cig pa'o //
analyzed: mchod ces pa ni gsol cig pa'o //
translated: Worship means request.

original: the tshom ni rnam rtog go //
analyzed: the tshom ni rnam rtog go //
translated: Doubt is conceptual thought.

original: gang gis the tshom bsal zhes pa la gsungs pa /🔽de kho na nyid kyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis the tshom bsal zhes pa la gsungs pa / de kho na nyid kyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: As to by whom doubt is removed, it is said:🔽By reality, etc.

original: de nyid gsungs pa ;
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa ;
translated: That itself is said:

original: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Secret, etc.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa i le'u dang por gsungs pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo'o //🔽de brjod pa ni khyod kyis bshad par gyur bas so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa i le'u dang por gsungs pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo'o // de brjod pa ni khyod kyis bshad par gyur bas so //
translated: The secret mandala is the circle of goddesses taught in the first chapter.🔽Since it is expressed by you, you have explained it.

original: khyod kyi drin zhes pa ni khyod kyi nyams su myong ba las so //
analyzed: khyod kyi drin zhes pa ni khyod kyi nyams su myong ba las so //
translated: By your grace is from your experience.

original: bzhes pa ni bdag mo'o //
analyzed: bzhes pa ni bdag mo'o //
translated: The mistress is the goddess.

original: rdo rje can @75a * //
analyzed: rdo rje can @75a * //
translated: Vajra-holder.

original: zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: This is the Tibetan.

original: ye shes kyis zhes pa ni le'u gnyis par gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid kyis so //🔽byas pa dag ces pa ni byas par gyur pa rnams te de kho na nyid gcig pus ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ye shes kyis zhes pa ni le'u gnyis par gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid kyis so // byas pa dag ces pa ni byas par gyur pa rnams te de kho na nyid gcig pus ni ma yin te /
translated: By wisdom means by reality as taught in the second chapter.🔽Those who have done so means those who have become doers.

original: byas par gyur ba rnams so //
analyzed: byas par gyur ba rnams so //
translated: By reality alone means by reality alone.🔽Those who have become doers means those who have become doers of the yoga of the two realities.

original: ngas kyang yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgom pa la nye ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i phyag rgya'i rnam par bshad pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ngas kyang yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgom pa la nye ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i phyag rgya'i rnam par bshad pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: I also will teach the classification of the explanation of the seal of the yoga of meditation with correct application.🔽He says:

original: shin tu chags pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu chags pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: With great passion, etc.

original: shin tu chags pas zhes pa ni don dam la shin tu chags pa'i bya bas so //
analyzed: shin tu chags pas zhes pa ni don dam la shin tu chags pa'i bya bas so //
translated: With great passion means with the activity of great passion for the ultimate.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bod pa'o //🔽rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bod pa'o // rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag 'byung //
translated: The Bhagavān is the Tibetan.🔽The vajra nectar arises perfectly.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma las bdud rtsi de rnams yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma las bdud rtsi de rnams yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
translated: This means that the nectars arise perfectly from the vajra and lotus.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba ni rdo rje las byung ba dang / padma rgyas pas khu ba steng du g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba ni rdo rje las byung ba dang / padma rgyas pas khu ba steng du g-yo ba'o //
translated: The arising of the vajra nectar is the arising from the vajra, and the movement of the seminal essence upward by the blooming of the lotus.

original: de'i steng du sbyor ba'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i 'dod pa nyams su myong ba de la ngas kyang brjod cing rab tu bstan pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i steng du sbyor ba'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i 'dod pa nyams su myong ba de la ngas kyang brjod cing rab tu bstan pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: On that, I have also described and taught means that I have experienced the desire of union, embrace, and so forth.

original: rdo rje theg pa yang dag 'byung ni sngags kyi theg par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa yang dag 'byung ni sngags kyi theg par bsdus pa'o //
translated: The arising of the true vajra vehicle is included in the mantra vehicle.

original: de kho na nyid rtogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa de'i don du phyag rgya gang zhig bya ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rtogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa de'i don du phyag rgya gang zhig bya ba'o //
translated: The mudra for the purpose of that meditative concentration that realizes reality is that which is to be done.

original: de la das kyang rab bstan pa 'dis bdag ni the tshom dang bral zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de la das kyang rab bstan pa 'dis bdag ni the tshom dang bral zhes dgongs so //
translated: In that regard, I am free from doubt is the thought of I have also taught by this.

original: 'on kyang da rung du bdag la the tshom yod ces pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang da rung du bdag la the tshom yod ces pa ste /
translated: However, I still have doubt is the thought of I still have doubt.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: da rung kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da rung kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Still, and so on.

original: the tshom zhes pa ni yid gnyis so //
analyzed: the tshom zhes pa ni yid gnyis so //
translated: Doubt is uncertainty.

original: gang la the tshom yod ces pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang la the tshom yod ces pa la gsungs pa /
translated: As to what doubt, it is stated:

original: phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The seals and so on.

original: phyag rgya zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: The seals are the pledge seals and so on.

original: sngags ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: sngags ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: The mantras are the mandala deities.

original: de dag gi rnam 'phrul ni rang rang gi yul rnams la rnam par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de dag gi rnam 'phrul ni rang rang gi yul rnams la rnam par sbyor ba ste /
translated: Their emanations are their respective objects of application.

original: de la spyi'i rigs gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams su brjod pa zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de la spyi'i rigs gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams su brjod pa zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that the seals are said to be the pledge seals and so on of the three families in general.

original: de brjod pa zhes gsungs pa ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽ji ltar zhes pa la rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rim pas sam /
analyzed: de brjod pa zhes gsungs pa ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o // ji ltar zhes pa la rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rim pas sam /
translated: It is said they are expressed, and how is that?

original: yang na thig le la sogs pa'i rim pas rdzogs pa rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i lha rnams sngon du bstan pa de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa phyag rgya rnam pa ji lta bu sngags bris pa yang yi ge'i @75b gzugs ni
analyzed: yang na thig le la sogs pa'i rim pas rdzogs pa rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i lha rnams sngon du bstan pa de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa phyag rgya rnam pa ji lta bu sngags bris pa yang yi ge'i @75b gzugs ni
translated: How is it that the pledge seals and so on of those deities, such as the perfect Vajra Amṛta and so on, who were previously taught in the Root Tantra stage by stage or in the stage of the drop and so on, are expressed by seals, and also how are the mantras written in the form of syllables?

original: ji lta bur zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: ji lta bur zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that how is that?

original: sngags rnams zhes pa ni yi ge ste lha rnams kyi rgyu sngags yongs su gyur pa las de rnams kyang gang du bskyed /🔽ci'i phyir lugs kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes sam /
analyzed: sngags rnams zhes pa ni yi ge ste lha rnams kyi rgyu sngags yongs su gyur pa las de rnams kyang gang du bskyed / ci'i phyir lugs kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes sam /
translated: The mantras are the syllables, and the mantras of the deities are the causes. From the transformation of those, those deities are generated.

original: gsang ba'i theg pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes dgongs so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i theg pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes dgongs so //
translated: Where? In the mind. Why? In the wisdom of the enlightenment mind of the system, or the wisdom of the enlightenment mind of the secret vehicle.

original: 'di rnams zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i rdzogs pa'i bye brag 'di rnams la bdag the tshom yod kyi gzhan la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i rdzogs pa'i bye brag 'di rnams la bdag the tshom yod kyi gzhan la ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, these refers to the yogas of the deities and so forth, the particulars of the perfection. I have doubts about these, not about others.

original: des na mdor bsdus nas sngags dang lha rnams kyi bskyed pa yang bdag la gsungs zhes gsol pa 'debs par byed do //
analyzed: des na mdor bsdus nas sngags dang lha rnams kyi bskyed pa yang bdag la gsungs zhes gsol pa 'debs par byed do //
translated: Therefore, please tell me in brief the generation of the mantras and deities.

original: gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams bskyed pa gsung bar bzhed nas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams bskyed pa gsung bar bzhed nas zhes pa ste /
translated: Immediately after the request, the Bhagavān, intending to speak of the generation of the deities, said:🔽Thus have I heard.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He said just that:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni de ma thag tu'o //
translated: The Bhagavān... and so forth. Just that means immediately.

original: bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The words he said mean he spoke.

original: ci zhig bka' stsal zhes pa bshad kyis nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig bka' stsal zhes pa bshad kyis nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What did he say? Listen to my explanation of the mantra and the mudra, and so forth.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la nye bar sbyar ba ni phyag rgya ste lag pa'i phyag rgya dang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la nye bar sbyar ba ni phyag rgya ste lag pa'i phyag rgya dang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The words mantra and mudra mean that which is applied to the mandala and so forth of meditation, and the mudra is the hand mudra and the sign mudra.

original: sngags ni aom yig la sogs pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: sngags ni aom yig la sogs pa'i gzugs te /
translated: The mantra is the form of the syllable Om and so forth.

original: de dag las byung ba ni bskyed pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de dag las byung ba ni bskyed pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: The words arisen from them mean generated.

original: de la thog mar phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pas phyag rgya'i nges par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la thog mar phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pas phyag rgya'i nges par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: In that regard, first, the determination of the mudra is stated by teaching the divisions of the mudra:

original: phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mudra, and so forth.

original: rnam gsum zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnam gsum mo //
analyzed: rnam gsum zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnam gsum mo //
translated: The words three kinds mean the three kinds divided into body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs las yang dag par byung zhes pa ni /🔽sku dang gsung dang thugs la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs las yang dag par byung zhes pa ni / sku dang gsung dang thugs la sogs pa'am /
translated: The words arisen from body, speech, and mind🔽 mean arisen from body, speech, and mind, and so forth,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba'o //
translated: or arisen from body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach those in detail, he says:🔽Body, speech, and mind,

original: sku gsung zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: drawing, and meditation.

original: sku zhes pa ni sku rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya'o /
analyzed: sku zhes pa ni sku rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya'o /
translated: Body means the body-vajra hand-seal.

original: gsung zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje gsung rdo rje sngags kyi las rnams dang sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba gang yin pa ni gsung gi phyag rgya'o ;
analyzed: gsung zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje gsung rdo rje sngags kyi las rnams dang sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba gang yin pa ni gsung gi phyag rgya'o ;
translated: Speech means the speech-vajra, and any action of the speech-vajra, such as the recitation of mantras and the performance of mantra-related activities, is the speech-seal.

original: ; thugs zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: ; thugs zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: Mind means the mind-vajra symbolic seal,

original: rdo rje dang dri bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang dri bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: such as the vajra, the bell, and so on.

original: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de yan bsam gtan ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de yan bsam gtan ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meditation of those symbolic seals is the cultivation of the thought of awakening, and so on.

original: bri ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog gis te /🔽dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam @76a * //
analyzed: bri ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog gis te / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam @76a * //
translated: Drawing means with colors such as blue, and so on.🔽The two kinds of mandalas, and so on,

original: pa gnyis so //
analyzed: pa gnyis so //
translated: are the subject matter of the tantra.

original: 'di rnams kyi nang nas 'dir dgos pa de rnams bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi nang nas 'dir dgos pa de rnams bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the necessary ones from among those, he says:

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Vajra-amṛta, and so on.

original: lag pa'i phyag rgya rnam par shes pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: lag pa'i phyag rgya rnam par shes pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma gsungs pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of the hand gesture is not taught to be its characteristic.

original: sku'i rang bzhin gyis gnas par byas nas zhes pa'o ;
analyzed: sku'i rang bzhin gyis gnas par byas nas zhes pa'o ;
translated: Having made it abide by the nature of the body.

original: ; rnal 'byor phyag rgya zhes pa ni rtags dang ldan pa'i chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ; rnal 'byor phyag rgya zhes pa ni rtags dang ldan pa'i chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The “yoga seal” is the sign-endowed dharma-source seal.

original: gsung gi phyag rgya yang sngags kyi gzugs kyis bya ba thams cad la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsung gi phyag rgya yang sngags kyi gzugs kyis bya ba thams cad la shes par bya'o //
translated: The speech seal should also be known in the form of mantra for all activities.

original: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The “sign seal” is the seal of the vajra, wheel, and so on.

original: de rnams dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la bri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la bri bar mi bya'o //
translated: Those should not be drawn in the maṇḍala and so on.

original: gsung gi phyag rgya dang chos 'byung yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la sbyar bar bya zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: gsung gi phyag rgya dang chos 'byung yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la sbyar bar bya zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that the speech seal and the dharma source should be applied to all activities of the maṇḍala and so on.🔽How can the maṇḍala and so on be without seals and signs?

original: phyag rgya dang mtshan ma med par dkyil 'khor la sogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang mtshan ma med par dkyil 'khor la sogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs la ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs la ni //
translated: The seal is the form directly perceived.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: mngon sum zhes pa ni mi'i phyag rgya mi rnams so //

original: rim par zhi ma la sogs zhes pa'o //🔽aom aa ha sv'a h'a zhi ma'i'o //
analyzed: rim par zhi ma la sogs zhes pa'o // aom aa ha sv'a h'a zhi ma'i'o //
translated: In order, Śāntā and so forth.🔽Oṃ a ha svāhā is Śāntā's.

original: aom da ha sv'a h'a zhi bar smra ba'i'o //
analyzed: aom da ha sv'a h'a zhi bar smra ba'i'o //
translated: Oṃ da ha svāhā is Śāntabhāṣā's.

original: aom nya ta sv'a h'a ni gtum mo'i'o //🔽aom na ha sv'a h'a ri bong can ma'i'o //
analyzed: aom nya ta sv'a h'a ni gtum mo'i'o // aom na ha sv'a h'a ri bong can ma'i'o //
translated: Oṃ nya ta svāhā is Caṇḍālī's.🔽Oṃ na ha svāhā is Śaśikalā's.

original: aom na ha na sv'a h'a ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //🔽aom mi ha sv'a h'a ri bong can gyi ri me'i'o //
analyzed: aom na ha na sv'a h'a ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o // aom mi ha sv'a h'a ri bong can gyi ri me'i'o //
translated: Oṃ na ha na svāhā is Śaśikalāmaṇḍala's.🔽Oṃ mi ha svāhā is Śaśikalārekhas's.

original: aom bam ha sv'a h'a yid shes ma'i'o //
analyzed: aom bam ha sv'a h'a yid shes ma'i'o //
translated: Oṃ vaṃ ha svāhā is Manonmanī's.

original: aom sam ha sv'a h'a yid 'dod ma'i'o //
analyzed: aom sam ha sv'a h'a yid 'dod ma'i'o //
translated: The mantra of Manonmana is Om sam svahā.

original: sgo skyong rnams kyi sngags gsungs pa /🔽sgo skyong rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgo skyong rnams kyi sngags gsungs pa / sgo skyong rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantra of the door-guardians is stated:🔽The mantra of the door-guardians is stated by the mantra of the door-guardians is stated.

original: sgo skyong rnams ni dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa rnams te drug pa'i gnas su bdun pa'o //
analyzed: sgo skyong rnams ni dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa rnams te drug pa'i gnas su bdun pa'o //
translated: The door-guardians are those stated in the maṇḍala, with the seventh in the place of the sixth.

original: de gsungs pa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de gsungs pa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantra of those is stated by the mantra of those is stated.

original: dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa dang mnyam par ldan pa rnams te dang po'i mang po'i tshig gis drug pa phyis nas bdun pa'i gnas bzhis nye bar ldan pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa dang mnyam par ldan pa rnams te dang po'i mang po'i tshig gis drug pa phyis nas bdun pa'i gnas bzhis nye bar ldan pa ste /
translated: The mantra of those who are endowed with the door-guardians stated in the maṇḍala is the first plural particle, the sixth after the anusvāra, and the seventh endowed with the four places.

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'dir bzhi zhes pa'o //🔽gang zhig @78a * //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'dir bzhi zhes pa'o // gang zhig @78a * //
translated: The vajra-word here is the mantra of those is stated.

original: dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi po rnams ni khro gnyer can la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi po rnams ni khro gnyer can la sogs pa'o //
translated: The four door-guardians stated in the maṇḍala are Kṣitigarbha, etc.

original: bzhi po 'di rnams kyi rim par ma ning gi yi ge bzhi rnams te /
analyzed: bzhi po 'di rnams kyi rim par ma ning gi yi ge bzhi rnams te /
translated: The four of these are the four neuters in order.

original: ri r'i / li l'i /
analyzed: ri r'i / li l'i /
translated: The letters are ri, li, vi, and vi.

original: zhes pa'i yi ge re re aom yig dang sv'a h'ar ldan pas sngags so sor brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i yi ge re re aom yig dang sv'a h'ar ldan pas sngags so sor brjod par bya'o //
translated: Each letter is endowed with the syllable om and the syllable svāhā, and the mantra is stated individually.

original: aom ri sv'a h'a /🔽khro gnyer can gyi'o //
analyzed: aom ri sv'a h'a / khro gnyer can gyi'o //
translated: Oṃ ri svāhā.🔽This is the mantra of Bhṛkuṭī.

original: aom r'i sv'a h'a /🔽mi bzad 'jigs pa'i'o //
analyzed: aom r'i sv'a h'a / mi bzad 'jigs pa'i'o //
translated: Oṃ rī svāhā.🔽This is the mantra of Ugra.

original: aom li sv'a h'a /🔽rta'i mtshul can gyi'o //
analyzed: aom li sv'a h'a / rta'i mtshul can gyi'o //
translated: Oṃ li svāhā.🔽This is the mantra of Aśvārūḍha.

original: aom l'i sv'a h'a /🔽tshogs kyi bdag po'i'o //
analyzed: aom l'i sv'a h'a / tshogs kyi bdag po'i'o //
translated: Oṃ lī svāhā.🔽This is the mantra of Gaṇapati.

original: ma ning gi yi ge bzhi po 'di nyid ni me tog ma la sogs pa'i yang sngags nyid ces gsungs pa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma ning gi yi ge bzhi po 'di nyid ni me tog ma la sogs pa'i yang sngags nyid ces gsungs pa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: These four neuters are also the mantras of Puṣpā and so forth.🔽Here, the word “also” is used because the mantras of those not actually arranged in the maṇḍala are taught here.

original: dkyil 'khor du dngos su ma bkod pa'i sngags bskyed pa 'dir gsungs zhes mngon par the tshom du gyur pa la dang po'i mang po'i tshig can gyis drug pa'i gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig phyis nas /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du dngos su ma bkod pa'i sngags bskyed pa 'dir gsungs zhes mngon par the tshom du gyur pa la dang po'i mang po'i tshig can gyis drug pa'i gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig phyis nas /
translated: Having removed the second of the sixth with the word “also” in the first plural,

original: gnas bzhi nye bar bkod par bya ste 'dir yang tshig gi mtha' bzhi zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnas bzhi nye bar bkod par bya ste 'dir yang tshig gi mtha' bzhi zhes pa'o //
translated: the four places are to be arranged. Here, “the four endings of the words” is used.

original: dkyil 'khor du dngos su ma gsungs pa 'di nyid du nye bar dgod pa ni me tog la sogs pa'i lha mo'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du dngos su ma gsungs pa 'di nyid du nye bar dgod pa ni me tog la sogs pa'i lha mo'o //
translated: Those not actually taught in the maṇḍala are arranged here as the goddesses Puṣpā and so forth.

original: bzhi po de rnams kyi nang nas me tog ma dang bdug spos ma'i lha mo dag rim par ma ning bzhi pa dang mnyam par ldan pa ni yi ge gnyis gnyis kyis sv'a h'a dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi po de rnams kyi nang nas me tog ma dang bdug spos ma'i lha mo dag rim par ma ning bzhi pa dang mnyam par ldan pa ni yi ge gnyis gnyis kyis sv'a h'a dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags su rig par bya'o //
translated: Among those four, the goddesses of flower and incense are respectively endowed with the fourth neutral state, and one should know that the two syllables are the mantras of Svaha and Vairochana.

original: tu'i sgras ni bye brag tu dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: tu'i sgras ni bye brag tu dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The word tu indicates a specific division.

original: aom ri r'i sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ri r'i sv'a h'a /
translated: Om ri ri svaha.

original: me tog ma'i'o //🔽aom li l'i sv'a h'a /
analyzed: me tog ma'i'o // aom li l'i sv'a h'a /
translated: This is the mantra of the flower goddess.🔽Om li li svaha.

original: bdug spos ma'i'o //
analyzed: bdug spos ma'i'o //
translated: This is the mantra of the incense goddess.

original: gang du de ltar me tog ma dang bdug spos ma'i sngags btus nas /
analyzed: gang du de ltar me tog ma dang bdug spos ma'i sngags btus nas /
translated: Where, having collected the mantras of the flower and incense goddesses in this way,

original: mar me ma dang dri ma'i yang ji ltar brjod par bya snyam pa la /
analyzed: mar me ma dang dri ma'i yang ji ltar brjod par bya snyam pa la /
translated: how should the mantras of the lamp and perfume goddesses be stated?

original: rnam par dbye ba drug pa mthong bas tu'i sgra'i nus pas 'dir yang rdo rje'i tshig ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis aom yig dang sv'a h'a'i yi ges rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mar me dang dri ma'i sngags dag ni man ngag gis zhes
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba drug pa mthong bas tu'i sgra'i nus pas 'dir yang rdo rje'i tshig ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis aom yig dang sv'a h'a'i yi ges rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mar me dang dri ma'i sngags dag ni man ngag gis zhes
translated: Seeing the sixth division, by the power of the word tu, here also the vajra words are uncommon. By the syllables om and svaha, the mantras of the lamp and perfume goddesses are respectively stated by the instructions.

original: pa ste / aom d'i p'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: pa ste / aom d'i p'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ dīpayasva svāhā.

original: mar me ma'o //
analyzed: mar me ma'o //
translated: This is the lamp.

original: aom gandh'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom gandh'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ gandhaya svāhā.🔽This is the incense.

original: dri ma'o // phyag rgya dang sngags rnam par bkod nas sngags dang dkyil 'khor la mchod pa bya zhes pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: dri ma'o // phyag rgya dang sngags rnam par bkod nas sngags dang dkyil 'khor la mchod pa bya zhes pa gsungs pa /
translated: Having arranged the mudras and mantras, he says, One should worship the maṇḍala with mantras and mudras.

original: mchod par bya zhes pa ni mchod cing dbul bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: mchod par bya zhes pa ni mchod cing dbul bar bya ba ste /
translated: Worship means to worship and offer.

original: mchod pa thams cad la mngon par chags pas /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad la mngon par chags pas /
translated: By being attached to all worship,

original: phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
analyzed: phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
translated: one should worship with outer and secret worship.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni padma'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni padma'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The secret maṇḍala is the lotus wheel.

original: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni bod @78b pa'o ;
analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni bod @78b pa'o ;
translated: Mamakāya means my body.

original: /'dis ni le'u gnyis par gsang ba chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: /'dis ni le'u gnyis par gsang ba chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'o //
translated: By this, the secret Dharma source maṇḍala is summarized in chapter two.

original: sdud par byed pas rang dgar brtsams pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: sdud par byed pas rang dgar brtsams pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to show that it is not composed by the compiler at will, he says:

original: bcom ldan rdo rje can gsungs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gsungs pa //
translated: The Blessed One, the vajra holder,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: has spoken.

original: sngags kun 'byung ba'i dbang du byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngags kun 'byung ba'i dbang du byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: He says, The source of all mantras.

original: rdo rje rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra elixir and so forth.🔽🔽

original: le'u'i ming gsungs pa /
analyzed: le'u'i ming gsungs pa /
translated: The name of the chapter is stated:

original: sngags 'byung zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sngags 'byung zhes pa ste /
translated: The origin of mantras

original: sngags ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sngags ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa rnams so //
translated: The mantras are those just mentioned.

original: 'byung ba ni btus pa ste le'u gang gis de brjod cing ston pa de ni le'u'i ming ngo //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni btus pa ste le'u gang gis de brjod cing ston pa de ni le'u'i ming ngo //
translated: The origin is the collection, the chapter by which that is expressed and taught is the name of the chapter.

original: grangs gsungs pa gsum zhes pa ste ;
analyzed: grangs gsungs pa gsum zhes pa ste ;
translated: The number is stated: three

original: le'u gsum pa'i rgya cher 'grel ba'o /
analyzed: le'u gsum pa'i rgya cher 'grel ba'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the third chapter.

original: // / de ltar bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rgyu ru sngags btu ba yang dag par bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rgyu ru sngags btu ba yang dag par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the collection of mantras as the cause of repetition, meditation, and recollection of the Buddha,

original: da ni sbyin sreg med par sngags dang 'khor lo'i nus pa rnams mi 'byung zhes pas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /🔽de nas des na yang dag bshad //
analyzed: da ni sbyin sreg med par sngags dang 'khor lo'i nus pa rnams mi 'byung zhes pas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / de nas des na yang dag bshad //
translated: now, in order to teach the rite of homa, saying that the power of mantras and cakras does not arise without homa, it is said:

original: ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, therefore, it is properly explained.

original: de nas zhes pa ni sngags bstan pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni sngags bstan pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Here, then means immediately after the teaching of the mantras.

original: des na zhes pa ni sngags rnams kyi 'bras bu myur ba'i rgyus so //
analyzed: des na zhes pa ni sngags rnams kyi 'bras bu myur ba'i rgyus so //
translated: Therefore is the cause of the quick result of the mantras.

original: sbyin sreg las ni don to //
analyzed: sbyin sreg las ni don to //
translated: The rite is the purpose.

original: cho ga ni bya ba'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: cho ga ni bya ba'i rim pa ste /
translated: The rite is the sequence of actions.

original: thab khung dang hom shing la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams so //
analyzed: thab khung dang hom shing la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams so //
translated: The sequence of the fire pit, sacrificial wood, and so on.

original: de ji lta bur gyur ba zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ji lta bur gyur ba zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: How is that? It is said:

original: rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Yoga and so on.

original: 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsgom pas gang byang chub pa de ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de /
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsgom pas gang byang chub pa de ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de /
translated: That which is accomplished by the meditation of enjoying the five desires is the Yoga Tantra.

original: de'i cho gas ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi cho gas zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: de'i cho gas ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi cho gas zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: By its rite means by the rite of the Vajra Amṛta Tantra.

original: ; rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams so //
analyzed: ; rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams so //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the nature of Vairocana and so on.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya zhes pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya zhes pa ste /
translated: What is to be accomplished is what is to be completed.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
translated: The means of accomplishing body, speech, and mind.

original: skyon thams cad dang bral bas zhi ba'o //
analyzed: skyon thams cad dang bral bas zhi ba'o //
translated: Pacifying is free from all faults.

original: nor la sogs pa yang dag par 'phel bas rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: nor la sogs pa yang dag par 'phel bas rgyas pa'o //
translated: Prosperous means that wealth and so forth are truly increasing.

original: rang gi dbang du byed pa ni dbang po //
analyzed: rang gi dbang du byed pa ni dbang po //
translated: Dominating means to make one's own.

original: gsod pa ni mngon spyod do //
analyzed: gsod pa ni mngon spyod do //
translated: Killing means to destroy.

original: phan sun 'gal bar byed pa ni rnam par sdang ba'o //
analyzed: phan sun 'gal bar byed pa ni rnam par sdang ba'o //
translated: Strife means to cause conflict.

original: rang gi gnas nas dbyung ba ni skrod pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi gnas nas dbyung ba ni skrod pa'o //
translated: Expelling means to remove from one's own place.

original: sngags zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i snying po rnams so //🔽phyag rgya ni rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs @79a * //
analyzed: sngags zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i snying po rnams so // phyag rgya ni rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs @79a * //
translated: Mantras are the previously mentioned essence mantras.

original: ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Mudras are the great mudras such as the vajra amrita.

original: de'i sgrub thabs ni rdzogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i sgrub thabs ni rdzogs pa rnams so //
translated: Their means of accomplishment are the complete ones.

original: de zhes pa ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa ste thams cad bstan par bya ba ni rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa ste thams cad bstan par bya ba ni rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag par 'byung ngo //
translated: That refers to what was just said. All should be taught as the arising of vajra amrita.

original: sbyin sreg dag gis bsdus zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyin sreg dag gis bsdus zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that they are included in the fire offerings.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Vajra amrita and so forth.

original: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Amrita is the result such as nirvana.

original: de'i yang dag 'byung ni gang du rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag 'byung ba'i rgyud dang zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i yang dag 'byung ni gang du rdo rje bdud rtsi yang dag 'byung ba'i rgyud dang zhes dgongs so //
translated: The source of that is the Tantra of the Source of Vajra Amṛta.

original: de la dang por sbyin sreg gis gzhi yang dag par sbyangs pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la dang por sbyin sreg gis gzhi yang dag par sbyangs pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the purification of the site by means of homa, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas //
translated: Having assumed the pride of Vajrasattva,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /🔽sa gzhi rnam par sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste / sa gzhi rnam par sbyang bar bya //
translated: etc.

original: zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir 'brel to //
translated: Here, [the Bhagavān] is connected with the line, “one should purify the site.”

original: rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas //
translated: Having assumed the pride of Vajrasattva

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyi nga rgyal lta bus so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyi nga rgyal lta bus so //
translated: means with the pride of the yoga of Vajra Amṛta.

original: dril bcas gnyis med ces pa ni /
analyzed: dril bcas gnyis med ces pa ni /
translated: With the bell, nondual

original: g-yas pas snying gar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / g-yon pas dril bu rked pa'i gnas su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pas snying gar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / g-yon pas dril bu rked pa'i gnas su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: means holding the vajra at the heart with the right hand and holding the bell at the hip with the left hand.🔽One should enter

original: 'jug par bya zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi khang par ro //
analyzed: 'jug par bya zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi khang par ro //
translated: means into the homa house.🔽The master of the maṇḍala

original: dkyil r gnas dpon zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi slob dpon no //
analyzed: dkyil r gnas dpon zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi slob dpon no //
translated: means the homa master.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi sa gzhi yang dag par sbyang zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon zhes pa 'dis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi sa gzhi yang dag par sbyang zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon zhes pa 'dis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The ground of the maṇḍala is the ground that is thoroughly purified.🔽Having entered, what does one do there?

original: zhugs nas des ci zhig bya zhes pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhugs nas des ci zhig bya zhes pa la gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: the three realms’ total victory, and so on.

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba khro bo'i rgyal po'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba khro bo'i rgyal po'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
translated: Having performed the deity yoga of the wrathful king who is the total victory over the three realms,

original: g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i byed pas sa gzhi yang dag par sbyang bar bya zhes dgongs so //
